{"kind": "blogger#postList", "nextPageToken": "CgkIChjA45TjxiUQy4Ca9ZL8nrwx", "items": [{"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5079903452880553816", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-11-23T23:05:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-01-19T06:42:59+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTQ3ODYwMzc5MjQwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/first-supari-and-turning-point-of.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5079903452880553816", "title": "THE FIRST SUPARI AND THE TURNING POINT OF INDIAN HISTORY -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv43aDMKWI/AAAAAAAAAoM/6aRmvqlZq7Y/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv43aDMKWI/AAAAAAAAAoM/6aRmvqlZq7Y/s400/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" width=\"314\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv5FJdA3SI/AAAAAAAAAoQ/zI7aLuLdFvk/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"391\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv5FJdA3SI/AAAAAAAAAoQ/zI7aLuLdFvk/s400/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv59dK_LWI/AAAAAAAAAoU/bHP73U2n_rQ/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv59dK_LWI/AAAAAAAAAoU/bHP73U2n_rQ/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv6JGxLPlI/AAAAAAAAAoc/xlsE6ypXiO0/s1600/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv6JGxLPlI/AAAAAAAAAoc/xlsE6ypXiO0/s400/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv9OSUwP-I/AAAAAAAAAog/jnHL12JJles/s1600/images+%25285%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv9OSUwP-I/AAAAAAAAAog/jnHL12JJles/s400/images+%25285%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv-XLQijEI/AAAAAAAAAok/Pmy5hd-Q5fk/s1600/images+%252812%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOv-XLQijEI/AAAAAAAAAok/Pmy5hd-Q5fk/s1600/images+%252812%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"line-height: 18px;\">KHYBER PASS, &nbsp;SAMYUKTA'S SWAYAMWAR WITH PRITHVI RAJ CHAUHAN</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">T</span><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">he hidden strategic Khyber Pass is a 53-kilometer &nbsp;passage through the Hindu Kush mountain range. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">It cuts through the northeastern part of the Safed Koh&nbsp;mountains . At its narrowest point, the pass is only 3 meters wide. &nbsp;It connects the northern frontier of Pakistan with Afghanistan, and was the only passage way to ancient India.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Khyber Pass has been a silent witness to countless great events in the history of mankind and a transit trough this rugged pass can be truly nostalgic.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Indian Aryans first used this high altitude pass at 3600 feet of the Hindu Khush range , in 4000 BC to migrate to foreign lands after the holy river Saraswati dried up. They went right up to Mesopotamia, between the Euphrates and Tigris.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In 326 B.C., when Alexander the Great and his army marched through the Khyber to reach the plains of India, actually led through, &nbsp;by the guides of the King of Taxila, who was bribed with gold.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In 1191 the ruler of Kabul , Shahabuddin Muhammad Ghori was given a bribe ( supari ) in gold by Jai Chandra Rathod, the Gahadvala king of Kannauj of the Gujjar ethnic group to teach a lesson to a handsome young Indian King by the name of Prithvi Raj Chauhan III of the Rajput Chahamana dynasty.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Chauhan\u2019s&nbsp; s kingdom included &nbsp;the present-day Indian states of Rajasthan,Haryana, and parts of Uttar Pradesh and Punjab with its capital at Pithoragarh .</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Sanyogita or Samyukta was the stunningly beautiful but headstrong daughter of Rathod. She had heard of the valour and goodlooks of Chauhan and was infatuated with him.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">She started corresponding with him in secret , as her father was at logger heads with Chauhan.</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"> </span></span><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The love between Prithviraj and Samyukta is India's most popular medieval romance.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">On finding out about the secret affair, Raja Jaichand was outraged that such a forbidden had been budding behind his back.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">He decided to marry off his daughter as soon as possible to a worthy king by a Swayamwar .</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"> &nbsp;In haste h</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">e invited the entire royalty from far and wide to the ceremony, every eligible prince and king - except Prithiviraj Chauhan, much to the chagrin of Samyukta .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">To insult Chauhan, &nbsp;Jaichand installed a life size statue of Chauhan at the gate of the Swyamwar arena , dressed up as a doorman.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Chauhan &nbsp;was provoked and he decided to elope with Samyukta. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">On the day of the ceremony, Samyukta walked through the court holding the ceremonial garland, ignoring the gazes of all her ardent suitors. She passed through the door and put the garland around the neck of Prithviraj's statue, declaring him her husband.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQSTlV_CTpI/AAAAAAAABw8/TIp9jwidYQc/s1600/images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQSTlV_CTpI/AAAAAAAABw8/TIp9jwidYQc/s1600/images.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Chauhan who was hiding in disguse nearby, immediately ran in scooped her inn his arms put her on his fast steed and made a daring getaway. This is now legend.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Jaichand seething with anger planned revenge.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">He was not strong enough to defeat Chauhan in battle, so he paid the first Supari ever to a mercenary Mohammed of Ghori, outside India with information as to how to enter India via the treacherous Khyber pass.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In 1191, Shahabuddin Muhammad Ghori, leading an army of 120,000 men and horses, invaded India through the Khyber Pass and was successful in reaching Punjab. Chauhan had a larger army of 20000 men and 300 elephants. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The two armies met at the town of Tarain, near Thanesar, in present-day Haryana, 150 kilometres &nbsp;north of Delhi.<br />\n</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">History repeated itself ( like for Alexander &nbsp;in 326 BC ) and Shahabuddin Mohammed Ghori's horse cavalry was unable to hold its own against the 300 elephants. Terrified , the cavalry broke ranks and in the utter confusion Chauhan won easily.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Ghori was made a prisoner. He begged for his life and honourable Chauhan foolishly allowed him to return to Kabul against the advice of Samyukta and his wise ministers . This was the biggest mistake which lead to Muslim rule in free India, for 650 years before the British rule.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Ghori rode back to Afghanistan, and then a year later in 1192 at the Second Battle of Tarain , &nbsp;defeated Chauhan with a stronger and wiser army. </span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Chauhan never expected this , as he and his army were still still resting on their laurels , with even his army staying with their wives,in celebration mode. Chauhan had pleaded to his father in law Jai Chand for military help. Still in a deep sulk , he ignored him . </span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Prithviraj was taken prisoner and was brought in chains before Ghori. &nbsp;He eyeballed &nbsp;Ghori getting him pissed off. &nbsp;Ghori ordered him to lower his eyes, whereupon a defiant Prithviraj declared that the eyelids of a Rajput are lowered only in death.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18px;\">Ghori prompty put red hot coals in Chauhan\u2019s eyes and blinded him. He killed him only after humiliating and taunting him for days .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18px;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Ghori who was known to be ugly , brutally and repeatedly raped Samyukta and she committed suicide. &nbsp;Her father Jai Chand in remorse later drowned himself in the river Yamuna. </span></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRyeB9OPjII/AAAAAAAACeg/GSjLObDqlFk/s1600/jodhaa1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRyeB9OPjII/AAAAAAAACeg/GSjLObDqlFk/s320/jodhaa1.jpg\" width=\"253\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Thousands of Rajput women jumped into the fire with their children and killed themselves ( jauhar ) . Countless hindus were forcibly converted to Islam</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Ghori\u2019s &nbsp;lieutenant, Qutb-uddin Aibak later ruled India and founded India's first Muslim ruling dynasty. He ruled over India for fourteen years . His son-in-law constructed the famous Qutab Minar, a mosque and minaret, in his memory.</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQSTL_yt-KI/AAAAAAAABw4/xvDszJhrv_8/s1600/download.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQSTL_yt-KI/AAAAAAAABw4/xvDszJhrv_8/s1600/download.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 4.8pt 0in 6pt;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The defeat of Prithviraj Chauhan also marked the end of Hindu rule in Delhi and the turning point in Indian history.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 4.8pt 0in 6pt;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">From then on, until the Indian republic was formed in 1947 India was under foreign yoke and slavery.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 4.8pt 0in 6pt;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 4.8pt 0in 6pt;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">A land that had been protected by Hindu Kush Mountains on its northwest frontier now was a thoroughfare for muslim invaders and marauders.</span></i></span></span></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">All thanks to hasty steps by Jaichand, the Gaharwar Raja of Kannauj ,who was angry with his own darling daughter--</span></i></span></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></i></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">-- the first Indian Hindu Supari donor to an alien Muslim goonda.</span></i></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot;;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">HINDU KUSH MEANS --HINDU GENOCIDE.</span> </span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">12 YEARS BEFORE HAZRAT KHWAJA MOINUDDIN CHISTI CAME TO INDIA, PRITHVIRAJ CHAUHAN'S MOTHER HAD A DREAM , AND SHE WARNED HER SON NOT TO TRUST A SUFI SAINT WHO WOULD COME IN AS A SPY FOR AN INVADER FROM THE NORTH. &nbsp;SEE HOW DREAMS BECOME TRUE, &nbsp;FOR CHISTI WAS A SPY FOR MOHAMMED GHORI.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot;;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prithviraj Chauhan paid\nthe price for ignoring his mother\u2019s advise. &nbsp;Khwaja Moinuddin Chisti had told his followers\nthat at Mecca , he was instructed by Mohammed the Prophet to convert Hindus\ninto Islam. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">His Sufi followers poisoned the lake waters ( Pushkar lake and Anagasar lake) from which the king's army elephants,&nbsp; horses and camels &nbsp;drank, as was standard warfare tactics in the\ndeserts ( poisoning the oasis waters ) .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below : Anagagar lake&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mU5b-ilVH2w/Uz0B8VEDDbI/AAAAAAAAq6Y/-OZKkAyNTxM/s1600/tyu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; People in the ancient days \u2013before &nbsp;Alexander the Great came to India by ship. And the biggest trade port was Calicut my hometown.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Even Alexander needed to marry Roxanna an Indian girl, before he was guided through the treacherous mountains. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NbDk_2ohdx4/UyBLL5PBEUI/AAAAAAAAqLk/SG6IJTMwWAw/s1600/4bbf00956.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NbDk_2ohdx4/UyBLL5PBEUI/AAAAAAAAqLk/SG6IJTMwWAw/s1600/4bbf00956.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"430\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i>Above: The hidden pass of Bolan. &nbsp; Enemies were crushed by throwing rocks from top.</i></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Travelers from the west would be captures and made to work in the mines as slaves and the women fold sold to wh0re houses even before reaching the Hindu Khush mountains.<o:p></o:p></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j5Nu_-Dw5K8/UyBj17tBMII/AAAAAAAAqMQ/x9eCvbQIVxQ/s1600/pic_batty5k5tle-with-porus.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Alexander and&nbsp; his cowardly Greeko army were sent packing with their tails between their legs, &nbsp;by a minor King Porus-- never mind the western FAKE propaganda that Alexander had Porus on his knees before him.<o:p></o:p></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LRFH6Bh9pzY/UyHtaZUQqTI/AAAAAAAAqPQ/Hw3cW9KKdZg/s1600/mapahjguivsia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>INDIA , &nbsp;WHOM ALL ANCIENT MEN SOUGHT , &nbsp;WAS CENTERED AT CALICUT- THE HUB OF SPICES AND ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE &nbsp;.&nbsp;</b></span></i></span><br /><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>THE BOLAN AND KHYBER PASS OF HINDU KHUSH MOUNTAINS WAS UNKNOWN EXCEPT TO PEOPLE INVITED TO INDIA. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></i></span><br /><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; SUFI SAINT CHISTI AT AJMER-- THIS</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">TRAITOR&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">WAS THE REASON WHY INDIA BECAME SLAVES FOR 800 YEARS . &nbsp;</span></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Below: Bholan pass in 1838 -- unwanted invaders get killed here or lost. &nbsp;Horses had to swim certain lengths- and they would be ambushed from a height by arrows &nbsp;and plain stones &nbsp;.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I do hope the powers that be take note of this blog.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I will NOT take sides \u2013this blog is just a statement of fact.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">INDIA HAS MANAGED TO CREATE A WORLD RECORD OF 500 MIG 21 AIR CRASHES IN TIMES OF PEACE IN A VERY SHORT TIME. </span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">THIS DUBIOUS RECORD CAN NEVER EVER BE BROKEN . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">MIND YOU, &nbsp;ONLY WE INDIANS,-- WHO MASS PRODUCED HEAVIER \u201cADDED ON HARDWARE\u201d &nbsp;MIG 21 LIKE AMBASSADOR CARS IN OUR HAL FACTORIES , &nbsp;--HAD THIS PROBLEM.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">THE REST OF THE WORLD WHICH POSSESSED 13000 MIG 21 VARIANT AIR CRAFTS , &nbsp;DID NOT CRASH IN THE SHAMEFUL &nbsp;WAY WE DID.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">INDIA HAD ONLY 900 MIG 21, OUT OF WHICH WE CRASHED 500. WE CAN HARDLY CONGRATULATE OURSELVES&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Fingers were soon pointed at poorly trained pilots. They had no idea like the highly trained US pilots how to take in the G force ( can go upto 8 times gravity ) vector of a tail spin, till the plane reached denser lower air , like Chuck Yeager .<i>&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><i></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">A shock wave forms on the aircraft when it reaches supersonic speeds. From the front of the plane, the shock wave appears as a circle, but from the back and sides, it looks like very sharp spikes coming off the plane. It is a rare and spectacular sight, only visible in humid weather. Usually the planes are up too high when supersonic for a visible vapor wave, and since you can't fly supersonic around populations, very few people have seen it..</span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The senior brass consisting of grounded ex- MIG 21 air officers who do NOT have to fly any more and thus risk their thick hides -- joined hands with political &nbsp;powers who locally licence produced substandard MIG 21 in HAL factories , as 60 year antique technology transfer &nbsp;, --</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">--and &nbsp;bought substandard spares (from Kyrgiztan and Uzbegistan at \u00bc f the cost to teach Russia a lesson ). &nbsp;When spares were NOT available IAF cannibalized aircrafts for spares .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">None of these break away republics of USSR has any metallurgical expertise like Russia . In India too Metallurgy is a unresearched branch. Russia is No 1 in Metallurgy expertise on this planet. My ships have taken old high grade Siberian rail track beams to USA ( hush hush ) for them to make weapon spares.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The young Indian pilots who were assigned to fly these substandard , ridiculously CHEAP coffins almost went into revolt. It was theirs to do and die no more.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">But then most of them had NO dang idea was going on! </span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Ejecting was always the easy option , with some days off for a concussed spine. A single engine MIG 21 is far heavier than the American and European fighters. Russians used only high notch light weight MIG 21 \u2013 in any case they have grounded all of them. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In 1953 the legendary US pilot Capt Charles Chuck Yeager, was the first to experience &nbsp;INERTIAL ROLL COUPING while flying above the sound barrier at &nbsp;Mach 2.4.&nbsp; &nbsp;His aircraft went out of control and tumbled in a inverted spin at 75000 feet. He regained control of his aircraft, like how a champion surfer will anticipate with a cool head and manage\u2014 rather than hit the easy panic button and &nbsp;jump into the water ( eject ) .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">MIG 21 was designed as a light interceptor with limited range \u2014NOT a dog fighter or a night fighter or a bad weather fighter . </span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">With every upgrade new stuff was attached , to the original light design. Russians kept the A grade MIG 21 with automatic correction systems for themselves ,</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">--- the low cost grade D came to India in exchange for low quality onions and Nav Bharat Charminar cigarettes , woolen sweaters and Bata shoes ( stuff ONLY for export to Russia which I have discharged in Odessa ). These aircraft would only be given basic operation manuals, so that cutting edge technology of roll stabilization systems &nbsp;is NOT pirated by Americans.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The yanks at NATO derisively called these HIGH TAIL &nbsp;planes Fishbeds. ( when the Sicilian Mafia delivered a fish at your door step , you are dead sooner than later )</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">As the supersonic aircraft gets older they start vibrating. This is why Britain / France &nbsp;did not wait for even ONE single Concorde to crash , before they decided to ground the planes. A lot of MIG 21 fires can be attributed to hydraulic oil leaks splashing on hot engine, due to machinery misalignment.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Auto Ignition Temperature of hydraulic oil is less than that of petrol. If you take two identical steel cups of petrol and hydraulic oil and put it on top of a Bunsen burner in the lab\u2014the hydraulic oil will burst into flames first.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Supersonic aircraft, reaches a velocity sufficient to bring about a breakdown in the normal fluid flow of air molecules as they part to make way for the oncoming object. At such speeds, the molecules of air in and immediately around the path of the oncoming body find themselves given insufficient warning to move aside in an orderly manner and are, instead, subjected to violent displacement. compressibility shock, brings major changes to the patterns of airflow pressures, densities, and temperatures that surround the moving body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Birds were swallowed in by the air intake circular nose tip while taking off\u2014 check out &nbsp;the picture &nbsp;. At super sonic speed the planes fly very high to avoid sonic boom claims from the general pubic. &nbsp;A bird hit while taking off at low altitudes cause a smoky flame behind the air craft &nbsp;, always reported by the onlookers \u2014this does NOT mean the engine was substandard.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">At home i have a HONDA portable kerosene generator . &nbsp;The Kerosene tank always get excessive mud and rust inside.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Now superior Kerosene is indeed Jet Fuel. The Indian Kerosene quality ( mitti ka tel ) is very poor , due to non-existent IOC/ HP / IAF quality control.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I remember when my stainless steel tank ship delivered Jet Fuel to US air force F16 at an island off Portugal, they took the samples to US mainland , before the fuel could be used by the F16 with low micron filters.&nbsp; Once when our company ship had failed samples, &nbsp;I was transferred from my ship at Baltimore to Lisbon . I found out that the problem was back dust at shore tank bottom.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7fJ2nMIbim8/TnckksSNH_I/AAAAAAAAGSY/JL-ZNZDz6Do/s1600/ndw.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7fJ2nMIbim8/TnckksSNH_I/AAAAAAAAGSY/JL-ZNZDz6Do/s400/ndw.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Heavier added on weights with every local upgrade meant that the plane requires additional after burner engine thrust to even take off due to weight creep . This plane can reach 19 kilometers high in one minute flat. This causes excessive burnout in a ill maintained engine while taking off.<span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The retrofitted heavier than designed aircraft with its high deta tail became more sluggish and unwieldy particularly during the landing and take off and in circuit where the aerodynamic control forces decline as a square of the flight velocity but the inertias remain the same.&nbsp; A heavy MIG 21 needs lots of energy to&nbsp; execute hard turns. The high Delta tail --hoped to substitute for low flying abiliy, inexperience and proactive resourcefulness of the pilots.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-35d743i-LFo/TnckprHcb3I/AAAAAAAAGSc/DuTSQvNU0mg/s1600/imagesCA6ZURW9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"369\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-35d743i-LFo/TnckprHcb3I/AAAAAAAAGSc/DuTSQvNU0mg/s400/imagesCA6ZURW9.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\">THE INERTIA OF THE HEAVER RETROFITTED FUSELAGE OVERPOWERS THE AERODYNAMIC STABILISING FORCES OF WINGS AND EMPENNAGE.</span></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Inertial coupling occurs when an aircraft such as that described above is quickly put into a roll, resulting in violent pitching and yawing, and loss of control as the aircraft rotates on all three axes.&nbsp;</span>Inertia coupling on an aircraft usually manifests itself as a downward pitching; rolling causes the tail mass to be flung upward and thus the nose to tip down. The pitching can in turn cause gyroscopic yawing.</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 18pt; margin: 4.8pt 0in 6pt;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Russians are now PISSED OFF &nbsp;about their high tech pride Sukhov 30 fighters and MIG 29 being crashed too by the squeamish Indian pilots. Probably the pilots chicken out and prefer to eject early \u2014 a routine thumb rule or legacy as per MIG 21 flying practise. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Was this a conspiracy to phase off the MIG 21 (which can do 2.1 mach) , and get a swank and easy to operate fleet in peace time ? &nbsp; Why not work for a BMW / Mercedes fleet of taxis rather than a turkey Ambassador or Fiat without automation , power steering or even a proper hand brake!? &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">If so they have succeeded for Defence Minister Antony will soon sign a 30 BILLION deal with Russia. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Solution:</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Stop this HAL retro thing. &nbsp;Train our pilots in Russia or USA to be proactive when the aircraft goes out of control .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Have HAL do R&amp;D and take in intelligent young engineers from IIT by paying them high salaries. No country will give expensive military cutting edge technology free in return for low quality onions and Charminar cigarettes. &nbsp;Buy genuine spares spending money. <span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">Only a mindless system which will allow low morale to creep into the air force.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\"><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Bottom line:&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">There are 2 types of ocean high wave surfers , the proud , experienced and well trained ones who keep their balance and can anticipate \u2014the other is the low morale rookie with low surfing hours who will jump off the surfboard when he sees a difficult wave. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "44", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6383090685707778762/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "144882647292132183", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-11-23T03:06:00+05:30", "updated": "2013-10-29T20:22:16+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzgzMDU4MzM2MDcwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/time-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/144882647292132183", "title": "TIME MANAGEMENT-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOrhyzWTuKI/AAAAAAAAAno/9pkIE6oAouQ/s1600/wasting-time.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOrhyzWTuKI/AAAAAAAAAno/9pkIE6oAouQ/s1600/wasting-time.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nMANAGING TIME LATERALLY-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nThis piece on TIME MANAGEMENT is for Masters of ships and top management ashore.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nAs usual I am leaving it un edited and deliberately disjointed.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nYesterday I bumped into a long haired John Abraham look alike dude at the Forum mall in Bangalore . My 19 year old son had me in tow in his quest for World Cup endorsed Adidas football shoes. The dude sported a T shirt with \u201c so many gals \u201c in front and \u201c so little time\u201d on the rear. .</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsOQ7hhtI/AAAAAAAABE4/0Drk0ipONDY/s1600/images+%252817%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsOQ7hhtI/AAAAAAAABE4/0Drk0ipONDY/s1600/images+%252817%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nI reached up and put a patronizing paw on his shoulder and drawled \u201c Son , you need to learn TIME MANAGEMENT \u201d . Pretty soon he was breathing down on me \u2014him , with his long haired mean look , sizing mE Sir Henry Morgan whiskers and obscene biceps.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPllcckDaI/AAAAAAAABDw/gmIhgxxQHH8/s1600/octopussy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPllcckDaI/AAAAAAAABDw/gmIhgxxQHH8/s320/octopussy.JPG\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nMuch to the relief of my pacifist son he decided in all his wisdom not to throw a punch and instead asked \u201c and how could I do that?\u201d .</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nI offered instant wisdom \u201c Use the law of forced efficiency --- MANAGE TIME LATERALLY\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nNow--The law of forced efficiency states that there is always enough time to do the most important things. Ok, you cant make time stand still or buy time or reverse time \u2014but you can at least make it run. Like how I used to make the Solankis and Tandels run at sea. It is no secret that Vadakayil got 12 months of work done on derailed Sichem Pearl in 4 months. I\u2019ll let out a huge chunk of the secret now itself . My walkie talkie was on all the time except when I slept\u2014no shipboard travel for conversing was allowed\u2014all official communications had to be on walkie talkie as a primary business tool\u2014conversations had to be to the point and crystal clear like masters orders to the quarter master on bridge while entering port with no scope for please, thank you or yaar shaar type fuzzy talk. In one swift move I heart punched the parasites and middlemen.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nThe best way for a layman to get a hang of time management is the vision of Michael Schumacher roaring into the Formula One racing pits in his red Ferrari. After exactly 5.9 seconds he roars off. . Just stop reading for a while and relive the scene in your mann- mandir. Did you see focus? Did you see concentration? Could you see finger tip preparation? Did you see any pregnant turkey on the job putting his hands into motion without engaging his brain in gear?. Was the time frame known to all ? Did the team understand the law of sowing and reaping? Was there a honing of key skills? Did every thing count?\u2014did the team understand that everything they did either helped them or hurt them? \u2013was any action neutral? In short was TIME LEVERAGED by the central organizer cum leader ? Was there a bullshit clich\u00e9 30% work expansion rule in sight for the usual screw ups cushion? Was there fuzzy conversation?</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nVadakayils law: Don\u2019t put your mouth or hands into motion before you put your brains into gear\u2014unless you are a reflex action trained Sukhov 30 MKI pilot engaged in a do or die dogfight with an F16. Action without thinking is the cause of every failure. \u2013and failure is the BIGGEST time waster.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsr1qdtqI/AAAAAAAABE8/5BySOm5927M/s1600/images+%252818%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsr1qdtqI/AAAAAAAABE8/5BySOm5927M/s1600/images+%252818%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nI had written about \u201chumour quotient\u201d \u2013 in my vision for the next century. I wrote that no manager would be employed without HQ. Time has come for me to expound for lot of managers are bound to confuse frivolousness and Mr. Bean type buffoonery with HQ. HQ has got every thing to do with a phenomenon called LATERAL THINKING. This is all about using the right brain lobe more effectively. The human brain has 2 lobes\u2014left and right. The left side is used by all and sundry in short the VERTICAL THINKERS\u2013 the right lobe by very few who are capable of LATERAL THINKING.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmXejocKI/AAAAAAAABD0/LmwdLF_rmPg/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmXejocKI/AAAAAAAABD0/LmwdLF_rmPg/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nThe right lobe deals with humor, creativity , insight, music , color, surprise etc. Logic , reasoning and experience is handled by the left lobe. Humor does not appeal to the sense of logic\u2014only to the sense of interest. Humor management promotes flexible thinking. Humor encourages novel approaches and promotes innovation by making it legitimate to think in illogical ways. It is an expression of freedom of the human spirit. Humor provokes new patterns and generates new ideas. Humor breaks out of the concept prisons of old ideas.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nWhen I talk about a mental hop it is about securing a good connection with the right brain lobe. The Indian Yogis touch their thumb with the middle finger ( instant mudra ) to kick start this mode. Recently a guy by the name of Silva has lifted this millenniums old \u201cDIVING INTO THE SUBCONSCIOUS\u201d Indian yogic concept to ring in his own cash registers \u201c . By the way Viagra kick starts your other hop\u2014tee hee.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nWhat is this lateral thinking all about---</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nDon\u2019t shut down your right lobe and your sub conscious and evaluate against experience using the left lobe \u2013for the conscious brain cannot multi task. A top manager who cannot multitask can never be a top notch performer.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nLateral thinking recognises that the approach to a problem is never as important as its solution. It cares two hoots for logical thinking which is the way computer software programs work. The tool of insight is a creative gift called lateral thinking. The good part is that lateral thinking can be learnt\u2014you need not be born with it. Brainstorming is one buzz term all are familiar with\u2014well this phenomenon is closely associated with lateral thinking\u2014I\u2019ll come back to this later ( avoiding time loss due to hasty decision induced firefighting ).</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nVertical thinking using the left lobe of the brain is all about being right and logical at EVERY sequential step\u2014it blocks all illogical pathways. Lateral thinking is more concerned with the wealth of thoughts . A vertical thinker and a lateral thinker had to go up a mountain with a large unwieldy piece of baggage. Guess what the lateral thinker did\u2014he went up the mountain without the load ( he took his thinking cap along ) looked down from the peak for the best way to bring the head load up\u2014and went down and brought it up . Well this was what the genius navigator Magellan did. He did not bluster his way through Magellan straits with his band playing \u201c kadam badhake aage chal\u201d on the forecastle \u2014he would take a small boat ,climb up a mountain and do some mental mapping from a vantage position before he took his ship through. Anybody who has been through Magellan straits will know what a tour-de- force his exploratory path was.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nA lateral thinker is never satisfied with the ADEQUATE beaten track. He does not drill his tunnel though logical steps to his goal\u2014rather he will leap frog\u2014opening new pathways. His last few steps is the one which will make his venture a success. Like building a bridge like the Sydney bridge. When the last part fits in at the centre\u2014and voila , the bridge suddenly becomes self supporting and is ready to take on the traffic.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nSo then the mall attendant approached the vertical thinker and asked \u201c Sir, may I know what you are looking for\u201d and he will give a within the framework , usual , answer \u201c Oh, I am looking for this and some of that and more of that\u201d . Then he went to the lateral thinker and asked the same question . The provocative , unreasonable and outside the frame work answer was \u201c I\u2019ll let you know as soon as I see what I want\u201d .</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nThe much touted and admired EQ of this century is about being right at every step. The misunderstood and much maligned IQ+HQ with its tinge of madness is all about being right only at the end. Sometimes the genius will move to an untenable position to find a tenable solution.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmcK9bTTI/AAAAAAAABD4/ZfchSvlcBCM/s1600/images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmcK9bTTI/AAAAAAAABD4/ZfchSvlcBCM/s1600/images.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nNo wonder till now most of the work of the Indian Mathematical genius Ramanujam who died at a young age , is still unsolved. The cracks where he leap frogged across deferring logic is still a mystery. He recognized the wisdom that the need to be right all the time completely shuts out creativity and progress.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nEver heard of making progress forward by moving backward? When this is what lateral thinking NASA did recently when sending a satellite to a far away planet. The satellite went the reverse way and catapulted around another planet to achieve the escape velocity . BRAINSTORMING is the principal tool for lateral thinking--- you can now recollect self brainstorming when I dived into the pool of mentoring to locate truths etched on rock.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nThe crew on Sichem pearl or Fairchem colt/ North contender will remember the profligate brainstorming exercises we had on the bridge . Lateral thinking is an&nbsp;anti judgement&nbsp;device unlike logic which survives on \u201cNYET\u201d MANAGEMENT or rejection. Here you deliberately delay judgement to save time. What does brainstorming do? It starts a train of thoughts. A group of people not less than 5 or more than 20 give their random thoughts to the chairman. People speak when they want to speak .Every thing goes. Nobody shall ridicule or shoot down somebody else\u2019s thoughts . If anybody evaluates somebody&nbsp;else's&nbsp;thoughts\u2014the chairman is expected to overrule it or expunge it from the minutes unlike a debate . For evaluation kills spontaneity in this group contribution to exploration and novel approach. A train of stimulating and provoking thoughts are generated working outside the frame work of reason\u2014the concern is for change and not for proof or logic. This breaks out of the frame work of rigid patterns and cliche units which our mind is so apt to construct because of the way it handles itself. Judgement or the selective stage is deferred ( procrastinated )to the the next day with the important men of the same group.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nLet me give an example of a successful brainstorming session which I held when I was a young chief officer on a hectic product tanker by the name of Visveswaraya. The engineers had their own duty mess where they used to eat in their greasy boiler suits at odd hours. Well \u2013Mickey mouse made a house there. Actually it was a huge vicious looking and fearless bandicoot who would charge at you if you tried to corner him. The master had a mini- crisis as the engineers refused to eat there till they saw the dead body of Mickey. Now Mickey was too large to enter a rat trap and sort of immune to rat poison. For the brainstorming session I called the entire crew list of nearly 60 crew . All and sundry gave their suggestions. The second engineers steward ( who was plain loco ) also gave his two pennies worth which made every body burst into derisive laughter. Actually this man was a big liability\u2014but since he had a past track record of good service and a huge family for whom he was the sole bread winner, he was tolerated . Now what was his suggestion? He said--- take two buckets one red , one blue ( which made me wonder if the bandicoot had colour vision ) half fill the red one with soap water\u2014 in the blue one put a piece of salted dried fish. That was all\u2014he looked confused and all were in splits , some even lying on the floor in tears of pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nBefore I terminated the brainstorming session I sort of made a judgement remark ( now \u2013you MUST NOT deliver judgement or evaluate during or after a brainstorming session \u2013as a matter of law ) \u201c I am sure to find a drowned rat in the red bucket tomorrow morning \u201c . That night I set up the buckets myself and locked and sealed the duty mess door. Full night I could not sleep out of curiosity. Finally after tossing and turning till 5 am I went to the duty mess with the chief engineer and master key\u2013and sure enough the huge drowned bandicoot was floating in the red bucket. I guess the scenario unfolded as follows. Mickey smells the dried fish ( it is the best rat bait, ahead of cheese ) comes out to investigate \u2013 the smell is powerful enough to home into the blue bucket\u2014 Mickey jumps right in\u2014 eats the fish--- gets his olfactory senses briefly overpowered\u2014remembers one more bucket holding a possible treat\u2014 dives right into the red bucket half filled with soap water and gets drowned. Success is the bottomline, gentlemen.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nSo EQ says PROCRASTINATION means poor time management---just dig the well deeper, we will find the elusive water yet and have an adequate well. IQ+HQ says just the reverse ---PROCRASTINATE JUDGEMENT TILL THE NEXT DAY. THE GENERATED ALTERNATIVES ARE SIFTED THROUGH IN THE SELECTIVE STAGE FOR THE MOST OBVIOUS ONE OR AN ALTERNATE STARTING POINT. Dig a few holes here and there \u2013they must be a better and beyond the adequate place to reach the fountainhead.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nTime for some light humor---</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nThe vertical thinking tall man with a blood soaked turban went to the doctor. He was traveling in a bus and every time the bus lurched he hit his head on a sharp nail by the side of his head. The doctor cried \u201c You poor man\u2014you should have exchanged your seat with some short guy \u201d. The man said \u201c I tried to exchange my seat all the time\u2014but there were no short guys in the bus\u2014in fact I was down right alone in the bus\u201d .</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nCompare this with the lateral thinking thirsty crow of Panchatantra fable fame who put tiny pebbles into a deep pot to bring the water up to where its beak could reach. Many onlookers accustomed to clich\u00e9 stuff would have accused this genius crow of running around in concentric circles .</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmyjW5uAI/AAAAAAAABD8/lO8zqntT5lI/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmyjW5uAI/AAAAAAAABD8/lO8zqntT5lI/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nSo then if you want to manage time the lateral way\u2014say good bye temporarily to analysis and judgement rock logic ways of Socrates, Plato and Aristotle--- the mass production factory scenario time saver mentality of the Oxford certificated Industrial Engineer . . . welcome to the wonder world of water logic by proactive design. There is really no substitute for commonsense when it come to managing time laterally. For work mysteriously expands to fill up the available time. And consider this \u2014those you live closest always arrive latest.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nHaving said so much\u2014can killing time be called time management? It depends on the larger picture. Imagine your football team is leading by a lucky goal against a stronger team and your team is playing 9 to their 11 players due to 2 red cards given by the rogue referee\u2014only 3 minutes are left for the final whistle. Be the master of time\u2014not its victim.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nTime is on our side the moment we organize it. Effort X time = constant.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nWORK SMARTER \u2013NOT HARDER. Your objective must be to get the best from your subordinates \u2013not the most. Be more concerned with thinking rather than doing. Manage your time pro- actively rather than passively letting time drip on your head. Measure results not activity. Time management means determining what to do, when to do and how long to do. Time should not be measured in minutes and hours and our long haired dude with the fancy T shirt\u2014rather it is the effort invested in the task and the significance of the task. It means doing the most important job NOW. It means dramatic reordering of priorities . It means not misplacing your energies\u2014by spending inordinate indecisive time on low priority tasks ( or the Big Ethels ) , leaving little time for the essential ones ( Aishwaryas and Angelina Jolies ) like our longhaired dude.</div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\">\nTime management is the also the inherent ability to separate chaff from the grain within a dead line. It involves constant choosing between what is less important and what is more important. The lateral thinkers call this CREATIVE ABANDONMENT ( Duh- wha? How can you be creative when you abandon? Duh?) Do not waste time on the impossible just to show that you have 3 full bags of positive attitude and you are THE company man.. A good time manager puts all jobs on a graph with time on the Y axis. He will not get involved in routine and detail. He can juggle 5 or 6 different tasks simultaneously and do them all well. He is effective\u2014not efficient.
