While appearing risky this type of approach actually reduces the risks of change by getting commitment upfront.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Coercing people into supporting change by insisting that it is necessary will not have this effect\u2014any minor setbacks during the change will serve to confirm people\u2019s suspicions that change was never necessary in the first place. Prevent it from becoming a banal insistence that we are all in this together. During change top management avoid communicating or seeking bad news because it is difficult for them to admit that they did not know. They become afraid to take risks , be innovative or try new things. Change has always challenged people in power.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change has to be anchored culturally. It has to be rooted in shared values not just shared hierarchies and processes\u2014it has to become the way we do things around here. It is not the changes to plans , procedures and hierarchies that are most difficult to implement for the Manager of Change\u2014it is the changes in peoples minds.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Making a major change which is OVERDEPENDENT on unreliable and incompetent manpower is a big risk.!!!!!\u2014read this line twice--</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Changing proactively makes planning easier. The aim has to be defined or there is no way to tell when success has been achieved. Remember there is no finish line in the race for quality. To have more than one goal is to have no goal at all. If multiple aims are unavoidable they must be consistent with one another, because any conflict between them will sooner or later lead to conflict between the people tasked with achieving them. The next vital step in planning change is to decide the boundaries of change. Essentially this means deciding its scope\u2014what is gonna change and what isn\u2019t\u2014 ( like the misunderstood scope para in company manuals\u2014Ha!!). Many change efforts quickly become messes or are messy from the outset. As a result they lose momentum or fail to address the problems they were intended to solve. This negatively affects attitudes and perceptions of people</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Now let us get to the nitty gritty\u2014</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPyv2el83I/AAAAAAAABFc/lcYHXblzh9k/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPyv2el83I/AAAAAAAABFc/lcYHXblzh9k/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Check out the Tarzan swing across 4 distinct phases\u2014unless you get all the way to the other side, you slip back and re-experience the loss, anger , chaos , uncertainty and frustration. I recently went on board a stainless steel chemical tanker as a CHANGE MANAGER. My briefing orders at EMS office was a terse \u201c convert donkeys to race horses\u201d . Communication was all the more difficult as none in the crew list , had learnt English in school or past work fields. On the first day after a cursory round I wrote numbers 1 to 4 on a crew list against each name. The Master was keen to know why he had the number 1 against him along with Chief officer , Third Mate and a few others , while Second mate and Cook had 4 , Chief engineer had 3 and all the rest had 2 . ( later I had to grease the vines and forcibly reverse swing the Cook back to 1\u2014lest he be the proverbial casualty of war. )</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPy8MP4vlI/AAAAAAAABFg/9n4lWejnqq8/s1600/images+%25287%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPy8MP4vlI/AAAAAAAABFg/9n4lWejnqq8/s1600/images+%25287%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">(1) DENIAL PHASE</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">It is an amazing psychological defence mechanism. The denial stage can be longer if employees are not encouraged to register their reactions . People see themselves as victims of change , and their undivided attention is focused on what they cant control. Expressing feelings is what helps employees to change . When a change is proposed , people focus on their own responsibilities, relationships and problems. Viewing a change from this perspective , they may not perceive the need for it. Closed cultures where the response cannot be shared will prolong the phase. Performance will be affected directly in proportion to the magnitude of the change. People show different types of responses. Mental and emotional signals are often harder for people to identify\u2014 unless the CM knows body language for noticing these signals. Don\u2019t ignore them. They are all important. One set influences the other like overlapping circles. Moving through change is never smooth or painless. Even the most welcome exciting change demands some letting go or contains some difficult situations. The life phase ( where you are in your life cycle ) has a lot to do in your way of approaching change. Letting go of the old way is a kind of death for the old timers who would rather drop comfortable anchor till retirement . The path through change is rarely smooth or predictable. The first need is to recognise the need for change and let go of old ways. It is often an emotional struggle. Create a strategy for getting through the transition. Pessimistic thinking or limiting beliefs encourages people to give up before they start\u2014I cant do this\u2014I cant change. When people think in negative ways they tend to act in ways that will not get them where they want. People trapped in their limiting beliefs are people who become victims of change. The opposite of limiting beliefs is empowering beliefs\u2014ways to look at the future in a positive light\u2014change is normal, there is always a better way, I can make a difference, I can learn to do this --. People who look at change with attitudes of possibility are looking for new ways to do things and seeking new skills. Remember, too many objectives will create anxiety and lead to poor performance</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Some not so bright managers think that by ordering employees to change in a harsh way like a drill sergeant they will. They do not realize how upsetting it is to give up work patterns that are familiar and that time is required to adjust. The response to such a mindless order will be a as follows--</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Signs and symptoms on people in denial mode:---</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Respond with silent terror</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Feeling of being out of control, powerless or unable to help themselves.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Fear of the unknown, sense of threat.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Fear of failure</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cThe pain will outweigh the gain\u201d</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Shock</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Sleep loss</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Apathy.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Activity without results.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Feeling of loss that an important part of life is lost.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Emotional distress due to abandoning of comfort zone and past quality experience loss..</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Embarrassment due to of lack of knowledge\u2014now all will know what a pretender I really am.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Crisis of confidence</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Pretend it is not happening and everything is as usual.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPzSfUPPZI/AAAAAAAABFk/DN5VWJkaSKE/s1600/images+%25288%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPzSfUPPZI/AAAAAAAABFk/DN5VWJkaSKE/s1600/images+%25288%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">BOHICA syndrome\u2014\u201cbend over, here it comes again\u201d, let\u2019s wait till it blows over.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cNo big deal\u201d, when in fact it is a damn big deal.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Refuse to hear new information.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Lose sense of belonging to a team.,</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change fatigue from past misdirected Change efforts, where he was a helpless victim</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Motivation sags\u2014retires from the job waiting for THEM to decide how things will be..</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cThreat to our competence</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Difficulty to open up, explore the world and themselves</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Loathe to take chances as learners.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Burn out and frustration grow due to undue focus on what cannot be controlled.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Wasting valuable energy bemoaning the loss of old ways .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Unable to focus on how to do new things .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Handling people in denial mode:--</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">It is about uncovering the \u201cwant to\u201d factor. Explain what to expect and suggest actions to adjust fast . Ignorance is bliss does not work when change has to occur . Keep your perspective and sense of humour. There is little need to trick them or force them as almost all want to do a good job . Raising the heat is about generating perceptions of the need to change, and waking them up to the fact that the current situation is absolutely untenable. Don\u2019t try the hardsell or show your hand in this denial stage to give people something to push against. For the change Manager group interests come first\u2014while for masses their individual interests come first . Change managers MUST acknowledge loss that has occurred and not pretend it is business as usual. Caring and supportive confrontation can help a person to change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">What helps people navigate through unknown territory is a map of what they can expect , INFORMATION on ways to respond to predictable challenges</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Deal with it\u2014move your employees fast through the denial stage.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Let them know that change WILL happen , why change is necessary.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Show that the top management given a clear consistent message supporting the change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Confront individuals with information .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Build awareness of the need and impact of change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Give opportunity to ask questions.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Shape your communications to --what does it mean for me?</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Focus on current batting averages and trends --not on glorious past averages.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Issue written memos after a one on one as people are hard of hearing when it comes to information which disturbs their security.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Challenge assumptions that past success is a permanent attribute of the company. Share negative information on what people are saying about the company.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Firmly advise stonewallers --\u201cdrop your ego\u201d. Send a strong signal that those who assist it are valued within the management .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Make them believe that it promises an improvement in the status quo. The burden of proof that change can be trusted lies with the prosecution\u2014not the defence.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Admitting that mistakes have been made in the past may be an important first step towards getting \u201cchange fatigued\u201d buy-in.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">People\u2019s own priorities and frames of reference may make it difficult for them to see the need for change. There is a good chance that people with a make or break influence over the change will not be receptive to it. This makes persuasion a key change management skill. Effective persuasion is not about defeat or manipulation \u2013it is about negotiation and enabling doubting Thomases and leading them into agreement without that win-lose feel. Persuasion takes time and effort because it is based on understanding \u2013not coercion and hence is powerful. Four key components of persuasions are\u2014establish credibility\u2014point to your own experience and expertise, frame goals on common ground, vividly reinforce your position for emotional impact, connect emotionally\u2014don\u2019t misjudge the mood and get lynched , watch your tone. ( how come Vadakayil has not been lynched yet? Beats me! --- tee hee ) There has to be agreement over ends and agreements over the means too.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Often key individuals have the power to make or break a change effort through their support indifference or opposition. So it is vital to get to grips with who these people are and how they are likely to affect the change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">If the big picture is changing as it will when major change is in the air, people need to understand this wider context so that they can relate their own situation to it.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Many feel upset about saying goodbye to the familiar. Let them feel the loss. Then make them let go and move on. A new way is not to be judged as better/ worse or right/ wrong. They are simply new and need to be learned practiced and judged on their merits.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Often , it will not be made public why a fiat was made or why something has to be done the way it is for all to evaluate. During such change things are NOT going to return back to normal, because there is no normal to go back to. You will just waste precious time that could have been spent learning new skills. There is never enough time , so don\u2019t throw away the time you have.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Some bad Change Managers encourage the team to be in the denial mode as it is easier to manage\u2014for the next phase can be read bad for the dhannadun leader who lacks grey matter and communication skills.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPzoKvQ09I/AAAAAAAABFo/MJrl0yhLLZ0/s1600/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPzoKvQ09I/AAAAAAAABFo/MJrl0yhLLZ0/s1600/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">(2) RESISTANCE PHASE</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Resistance requires some understanding of the change and can occur only after the denial stage has passed This phase is the most difficult phase for the Change Manager. Resistance is a rational way for a person to protect himself from overload or harm to self interest. It is thus a positive attribute of self preservation and defence. It should be recognised as an asset and accorded certain status. Don\u2019t suppress resistance or avoid it. Allow release of steam before you start building a response. Resistance brings to the surface problems ( like slag in the metallurgical process ) to solve that help overcome unaccounted for difficulties in the change process. There is no need to create a guilt for expressing it.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Signs and symptoms on people in resistance mode:---</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Rising personal distress levels..</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Culture of cynicism</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Doubting their ability to survive the change</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Afraid they will look foolish</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Depression</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Projecting blame on others--issues kicked about in a culture of blame</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Stubbornness , deadlocking</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Mourning the past more than preparing for the future.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Withdrawal from the team</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Mistakes</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Lower productivity. The worst part and most difficult type of resistance is passive \u2013aggressive behavior or people pretending to cooperate. Selfish hidden agendas .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Foot dragging. Doing only what can be measured.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Sick party</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Negative attitude</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cIt aint my job\u201d,--out and out opposition</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Sabotage through sloppy performance</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">A feeling of a need to lash out at someone</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cWe make the sacrifices and then will be cast aside\u201d</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cChanges will be cosmetic not fundamental\u201d</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Every one under attack and no one dares to be innovative</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Backbiting, griping , bad mouthing.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cThe Change Manager will disengage when things go wrong, he cant walk his talk\u201d</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Complaining including about tools.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Believing outlandish stories.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Feeling of frustration \u2013\u201cthere is no choice\u201d</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">\u201cChange is imposed from above and we have to lump it -- our opinions are not valued\u201d.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Handling people in resistance mode:--</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Resistance is a sign that the group has left the denial phase and are ready to move through the change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">It shows the human self defence mechanism is beginning to take over and hence is an important step in recovery. NEVER EVER take resistance personally.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Surface the resistance. There is no commonsense in denying the resistance. It will just make it go deeper and last longer. Invite it, honour it, make it safe to express resistance by assuring the resistor that he will not be victimized. Ask clarifying questions and make sure you understand the concerns. Make no attempt to interrupt , state your position, sell , reason or imply that the resistance is invalid while it is being explained. Don\u2019t try to talk people out of their feelings. Disagreement is a major contributor to development of alternatives. Without a full range of alternatives an inappropriate decision may occur. . Don\u2019t try to complete the process too quickly.&nbsp; Don\u2019t put too much effort into debating small points of implementation and resource at this stage\u201d\u2014leave aside mistakes in commas and semi-colons.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Ignoring culture is not a bright thing to do\u2014it may be advisable to present new directions as building on past efforts , rather than a revolution. Cultural changes are not optional changes to be considered as an after though, they are an integral part of the change management. Culture is the character of a business\u2014\u201c it is the way we do things around here\u201d. Culture exists in people minds and in the relationships they form with their colleagues which find expression and manifestations elsewhere in work. These are unwritten rules, customs and conventions as opposed to their official equivalents. It includes the way peoples territories are defined and marked. It is about attitudes to long hours, how people identify to each other and their team, the large picture.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Culture is often most keenly felt by those visiting a business for the first time ( all notice and feel the suppository entrance of EMS Spore office, where either there is a yellow faced toilet cleaner on the ground floor or people lounging around smoking at the top floor\u2014when they should be working ) .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">No culture is inherently good or bad, each has its place. A mercenary culture while often a tough place to work may be right for those who focus on short term results rather than happiness at the workplace. Changing a culture is extremely difficult \u2013if culture is preventing growth or development then CHANGING CULTURE to move forward is a must.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">As a last resort change structure, to change culture.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Explore the resistance. Differentiate between authentic resistance and pseudo-resistance.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Resolve conflict. There is a big difference between disruptive conflict and constructive conflict. . Conflict and debate can be a positive force in reaching a sound decision. Sound decisions are the goal of adaptation to change. Differences of opinion should be welcomes since they provide the opportunity for creative constructive discussion that can throw up new options. Inaccurate assessment and hasty decisions does not address real problems</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Listen</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Acknowledge feelings-- there is no need to agree but acknowledge them.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Articulate dissatisfaction at status quo.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encourage and support good 2 way communications-- hotlines ,</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Verify if feelings match actions</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Give personal reassurance</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Be patient ..</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Hold rituals to say goodbye\u2014it is not a immature thing to do.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Discourage politics by dealing with issues in group settings \u2013not one on one</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Go for quick wins. Changes that will demonstrate themselves in a tangible positive highly visible way early on should be prioritised\u2014to show that a difference is being made , to bring a sense of partial closure, to show that part of the change has been achieved and recorded and that it cannot be undone\u2014reason why I keep sending so may sitreps or ask for Johnsons polish or toilet flushes. It may be worth making some sacrifices in terms of practicality or time scales in order to achieve a quick win. Beginning a project is not a quick win\u2014it has to be a concrete highly visible and completed collective achievement. It does not fall into the category of it might have happened anyway.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">There will be diehards who still deny the need for change in the face of all evidence, hence the CM raising the heat must be tough and resilient on a personal level. In places where stability has become institutionalized and reactive management and shoving under carpet is the norm, raising the heat can be the only way to move forward. Articulate that poor performance is not tolerated, only the best will do. Emphasise the consequences of not changing</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Allow for withdrawal and return of diehards who are temporarily resistant. Very few people are irretrievable, in my experience.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">People never resist their own ideas. By involving them in the process about making decisions about change you can secure their active commitment to change or at least make it less likely that they will resist it. Without involvement in change negative perceptions can arise. I hold the \u201cTell Vadakayil\u201d safe programme \u2013for people to come forward with issues and new ideas. Horizons of responsibility/ interest will determine what they need to know. There is no need to tell the cook everything, just because he want to know every dang thing.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">During change you may feel that you have only limited power to influence the outcome. When you feel this it is wise to find areas where you have direct influence.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">You can influence the change progress if you can make suggestions, talk to others and add your input.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">People will want to be stroked and offered reassurance that their status and position is not under threat. Once you are in touch with insecurities or fears you are halfway to creating the message they want to hear.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change can sometimes shift a persons status in an organization. People highly respected before the change because of their skills , longevity, experience etc may suddenly be brought to par with new comers who have new skills or unique Sigloo / Chemical experience. The CM must be sensitive and aware of this sort of resistance from old timers who have influence in the group and are loathe to the upset of power balance. They wrongly believe that change is a form of criticism above the way things used to be done. They hope that benefits may result to them if they resist strongly to the change. However explore if any resistance is pseudo resistance. This type of resistance is rooted in deep grudges, resentment of authority, need for attention, plain jealousy etc. Ask what is your objection? What would you prefer? Remember , it is emotions that are not expressed that cause continuing heartache. Just because conflict was not given a chance to express itself\u2014it will not disappear. It simply goes underground to reemerge in disguised forms and non productive ways. . Deal with pseudo resistance later unless it is blocking the change progress.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Quite often change managers who spend all the time talking in a meeting are afraid of hearing responses . Listening provides you with learning , messages , meanings , perspectives , intensity of response , emotional punches and feelings. Ask open ended questions\u2014what do you think of this change?.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Quite often you find people moving back and forth between resistance and exploration\u2014it is a crazy time for them. There are some open to new ideas but afraid to move forward.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPz_fZdrkI/AAAAAAAABFs/SpjDcHqyyis/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPz_fZdrkI/AAAAAAAABFs/SpjDcHqyyis/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">(3) EXPLORATION / ADAPTATION PHASE</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">All emerge from negativity</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">People realize that they are going to make it through in one piece</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change is acknowledged , accepted and even welcomed</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">If unforeseen logistic or economic difficulties crop up in this stage the CM must not be scared to abort the change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Signs and symptoms on people in exploration/ adaptation mode:---</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Letting go of the old</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">All breathe a sigh of relief, shift into a more positive hopeful future focused phase,</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Motivated to swing into action without first trying first to find the right way, This is a high period of energy and creativity will be at the peak.,</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Learning new skills.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Brainstorming with others</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Lots of energy and new ideas but lack of focus.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Developing sense of autonomy or self direction</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Regain a sense of control over their destiny</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Handling people in exploration adaptation mode:--</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Plant the seed</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Instill a sense of urgency</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">New ways of working needs to be explained.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Provide training.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Prioritise.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Set short term goals.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Hold planning sessions.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Assist in problem solving.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encourage independence and personal responsibility.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Players to know their individual parts perfectly. They must have the ability to see both the big picture and part of the situation.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Identify desirable behaviors that must be enabled and encouraged --what things must be changed before other things can be changed.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Leadership intervention at the right time to pre-empt and trouble shoot problems. Not everyone can be involved at the same level\u2014but any involvement at a practical ( not planning ) level will help.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Recognise sacrifices and extra efforts. People will become cynical if it dawns upon them that their opinions were only sought to oil the wheels of change and are irrelevant thereafter.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Assist in pain free change</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Newsletters, feedback to promote motivation\u2014people who hear nothing usually fear the worst</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Show people to learn how to learn, how to respond quickly and develop flexibility towards new demands.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Don\u2019t let people become constrained by job descriptions if they can contribute more---let them voluntarily go where the problems are , when there is much to be done and not enough resources to do it.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Don\u2019t settle for comfort.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">People often get stuck in a failed situation\u2014they do the same thing harder, louder, longer or stronger than before , even though it did not work. Often people would rather stay stuck than risk something new.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Your success at managing past changes you have just experienced provide insight about how you will manage future changes.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Celebrate your success for a nano scond and move on.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPP0NyFmvDI/AAAAAAAABFw/5gXUyJ0hIfQ/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPP0NyFmvDI/AAAAAAAABFw/5gXUyJ0hIfQ/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">(4) COMMITMENT / INVOLVEMENT PHASE</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">They will become advocates of change rather than being resistant to it . People have adapted to the new situation. Commitment occurs when an employee pursues a specific goal in a consistent manner. Commitment and involvement are both necessary for successful installation of change. To understand the difference think of bacon and eggs. The chicken is involved-- the pig is committed. Employees will soon demonstrate a personal investment and sense of ownership to achieve the change. They will reject behaviors not compatible with implementing the change. Feel the climate of trust where all are encouraged to openly express ideas, opinions, disagreements and feelings and where the management welcomes questions.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Signs and symptoms on people in commitment involvement mode:---</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Focus is now on new course of action.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Cooperation</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Teamwork</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Finding new balance and direction.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encouraged to think and act creatively.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Better focus and planning.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Visionary leadership.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Participation in change, initiate work on their own.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Stability.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Finding opportunities.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Belief in change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Sense of value in work.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Passion in work</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Handling people in commitment involvement mode:---</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Getting through change demands collaboration. Directive style of low participation where leader is responsible for results is different from collaborative style of high participation, where the set standard or system is responsible for results. When time is of the essence , when you cant afford to make mistakes ( say a vetting inspection is round the corner ) do not use collaboration. A word of caution here. Constructive conflict occurs in an atmosphere of high team spirit and commitment to group goals. Disagreements stem from a sincere involvement with the common problem.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Increase involvement</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Set long term goals.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Concentrate on team building.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Reward.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Remember, covering up poor performance simply extends the times the employees will be in distress.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Offer opportunities for team members to be part of making change work.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encourage creative thinking, encourage employees to conduct meetings to enhance ownership of goals and to give space for fair solutions . The CM must leave the room is his presence is influencing the direction of problem solving.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encourage employees to research, evaluate and make recommendations for adaptation.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Develop an action plan that allows for maximum productivity.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Actively create new customs that support the change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Celebrate success and praise those who make change happen .</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">No face saving\u2014if new venture fails to deliver the plug is pulled out or they get redesigned.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Adequate follow through is equally important to successfully implement a change Stop and think\u2014how often do you stop your tennis or golf swing at contact point with the ball.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Provide complete and accurate information.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Rewards for participation and assistance. The team must have the ability to accomplish difficult and unpopular items.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Figure out the key player implications\u2014there must not be any dependency on any key payer for success\u2014he goes ashore to see the doctor and all goes PHUT.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Figure out the milestones that the change must harmonise with.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Technical and practical problems should be expressed diplomatically to avoid damaging commitment to change</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">By demonstrating realism about the possibility of failure coupled with concrete plans to deal with it could help to build commitment to change.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Set the right norms of conduct in the team.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Encourage trust.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Make reporting simpler and direct.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">New change can emerge even before you have completed a previous one. It is commonplace to have several transition rhythms going on at the same time. Setting up milestones is about deciding what will happen when. Closely linked with prioritisation it is invaluable in getting to grips with far reaching changes to prevent them from being open ended , unfocused periods of undirected activity. Milestones should be defined both in terms of result and time scale. What would you like to have achieved at particular points in the future Reaching a milestone presents two important opportunities. The chance to celebrate and learn from change efforts so far, and the chance to redirect the change effort if it is drifting off course.. Identify the resources\u2014what the change is likely to cost in broad terms. What has to be excluded till a particular milestone\u2014or permanently.. who will be involved\u2014the best people for the tasks required. Some immovable pillars have to be circumvented by flexible aspects of change</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">CHANGE MANAGER:</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change Management is like loading a ship in ballast to tropical load in dock water at even keel\u2014includes deballasting ( reducing restraining forces ) , loading ( adding driving forces ) and trimming/ listing (changing direction of forces ).</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">It involves a new type of leadership\u2014less as a controller and more as a coordinator , focuser , facilitator and intelligent delegator.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change has affected policies , procedures, rules and roles. Authoritarian style of management has given way to participative management. The Authoritarian manager and hierarchical management structure is no longer effective. Forced change without grassroot support will have half hearted results</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Change Management is one of the most demanding tasks in business. It requires the full range of management-- hard skills in planning, project management and analysis and soft skills in persuasion. Many efforts at transformation change because they neglect the human side of change. When the company became big, they forgot to preserve the feel of a small company.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">Better to have a single good CM than having many managers arriving at a mutually agreed Lowest Common Denominator ways forward that dilutes the aims of the change by including only the most conservative and cautious options. Peripheral experts , those outside the normal loop of business can be helpful in bringing a more objective perspective to beliefs and assumptions</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">The change masters job is to move people through change easily. People who practice change management skills know how to reduce the stress of the change. He will not approach change as a mere technical project.</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Times, 'Times New Roman', serif;\">He understands the 4 phases of the change matrix, which tells him where to focus his energies. Sometimes he will move backwards to the transition curve to make progress.
