In a shore office like EMS Spore I could see the way people polarised by checking out who got let out of whose social invite or office email humor. I remember I once started a chain of email humor just to check this out.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nIf the goals are foggy or too easy to achieve, the team will not be motivated to make the extra effort that separates a high performance team from an ineffective motley bunch. Goals provide a sense of direction to the team and should not be impossible to achieve. They also must be measurable so that the progress can be monitored.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nWhen there is no synergy in the team, the people are passive. Their skills and knowledge are not utilized and they waste their time. Any team must have just enough hands to do the job and no more.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nIf bonuses and incentives are part of the reward system, they should be given to teams performance\u2014not individual performance. Team culture is destroyed by racism, inappropriate race based pay systems , divide and rule overtime policies, horrid working conditions and destructive comments from management. A team cannot achieve its full potential if all that is allowed is logic or information. Any team must focus on real work. When the team realizes that all you are allowing them is to re-arrange the deck chairs on a passenger ship or chip away rust from deck plates or keep a mere lookout, rather than helping to run the ship\u2014they lose interest.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nWorkplace teams are a means NOT an end. Teams are a means to do something better, quicker, safer and cheaper. A cookbook approach cannot be taken to build teams. Team members often tend to want to clone themselves and invite participants \u201cjust like me\u201d.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nBe sensitive to friction. Nip it in the bud before it ends in a full scale war with everybody taking sides. Let it be known that feuding wont be tolerated. Reason with them. Don\u2019t take sides\u2014but take swift and resolute action. People must be polite, friendly and kind in a workplace. People are entitled to respect, civilised behaviour and dignity. Creating a good atmosphere is easy when it comes from top down.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nIf you take sides then you are part of the argument and the disagreement. You as a leader have to remain totally objective and in the middle. Being conciliatory is like mother hen breaking up a fight between 2 of her chicks.. You just want to restore peace. You will not spend inordinate time in finding out who pecked whose ass first.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nYour rules say that there can be no bullying, shouting, threatening , intimidation or victimisation in your team. This is abuse. You are allowed to refuse abuse . If somebody is not doing his job he should be taken aside and his mistakes pointed out calmly and rationally. There are the proverbial little chick-licks on whose head an acorn fell and she thought that the sky fell down\u2014and she set off hoppety hop to tell the king\u2014whipping up mass hysteria along the way.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nIf the team comes to work looking to enjoy themselves, be stretched and challenged then you can get the best out of them. It is the job of the leader to get them emotionally involved , instill pride and make them care about what they do.---that what they do makes a difference, rather than just line the owners pockets. Getting your team to soar takes passion and determination. No one can whistle a symphony\u2014it takes an orchestra to play it. Be ready to prune dead wood, straggly growth and tone deaf lousy flute players.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nThe force of a team like a typhoon takes time to grow\u2014but once it is spinning, it is a formidable thing indeed.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nENDING WITH HUMOUR</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nLaugh at yourself before others can laugh at you, then if they laugh at all, they will laugh with you.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nHumor is a language which we can use to creatively retrieve a lost position and it is often more effective than pedestrian logic and self justification. Insight can be gained through humour\u2014to hit the mark in a way rational arguments don\u2019t achieve. Humor leaves a gap for you to fill in with your own interpretation. In the world of humor and creativity there is no such thing as nonsense\u2014at least not in the generating ideas stage. When you want to make an imaginative leap\u2014nonsense is exactly what you want. In a meeting where every nods their heads and say \u201cyeah \u2013makes sense\u201d\u2014remember there are probably a thousand people doing it already. Most great innovations are initially regarded as weird, because that is not part of thinking as usual.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nA violin virtuoso believed he could play the violin so well that he could charm all the savage wild beasts. He played for couple of weeks unharmed in the deep Indian forests . One day he was eaten up by a starving tiger. All the other animals approached the tiger and cried \u201cwhy did you do that\u2014he was playing such divine music \u201c. The tiger just cupped his ears and countered \u201cwhat?\u201d. Beware \u2013there are many such deaf people in this world\u2014and there are also the types who pretend to be deaf. Or they will pretend to sleep and expect you to wake them up. You can be a genius , and the most valuable asset of your company --- there are many who are not bright enough to acknowledge you ----or out of jealousy will deliberately not acknowledge you.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nThere was this rude boss with the logo \u201cdo it now\u201d poster in his cabin. Sure enough, soon \u2013his deputy ran away with his wife , his accountant ran away with all his money and his trusted secretary informed the police about how he embezzled and siphoned off company funds.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nPlayfulness or humor allows you to adopt a wider angle lens on the problem, to see old in new ways. Humor is a trigger to free up the mind so that your thinking gets less stuck. You are creating a new chemistry in your brain, walking on roads less travelled.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nHumor relaxed the narrowly focused mind to allow intuition to come in the fore front. It is not a problem solving technique, but a different state of emotion. Humor comes from the right side lobe of your brain where intuition also lies.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nContextual humour-- At the exit of a grave yard, engraved on a tombstone \u2014\u201c I told you I was ill \u201c\u2014 never failed to make the saddest person smile.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nSignature logos\u2019 for agent provocateur</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nEfficiency consultant</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nSow a thought today</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nSkill powered confidence</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nWhere team culture rules</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nIf you are not having a good time you aint doin\u2019 it right</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nSeize the moment</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nBlaze that trail</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nMake the most of now</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nWhere thinking triumphs</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nFire your creative imagination</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nMind musician</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nStereotype mould buster</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nAwaken your enthusiasm</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nWhere terrain prevails over maps.</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nElegant solutions always</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\nSay YES to NOW</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1551814162779#c2541197152540096488\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 6, 2019 at 12:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME UP AND SAID<br /><br />HE SPOKE TO SOMEONE AT SEA WHO KNEW ME WELL FOR YEARS<br /><br />HE SAYS IT IS TRUE THAT CAPTAIN KICKED THE COLLECTIVE BALLS OF ALL HIS SHORE BOSSES AND NOBODY DARED TO SACK HIM..<br /><br />WHAT IS THE SECRET ?<br /><br />LISTEN--<br /><br />I HAVE ALWAYS TOLD MY JUNIOR OFFICERS WHO TOLD ME \" YOU ARE MY ROLE MODEL SIR\" THAT I AM A POOR ROLE MODEL.. NEVER BE MY CLONE.. YOU WILL SUFFER PAIN AND DISGRACE<br /><br />THE SECRET WAS EXTREME COMPETENCE POWERED BY LUCK- AS MY FAR FETCHED PREDICTIONS ALWAYS CAME TRUE..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BUT THE REAL REASON WAS --&nbsp; WHICH EVER COMPANY I SERVED, I WAS THEIR NO 1 AND ONLY TROUBLE SHOOTER ..</span></b><br />THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF CASES OVER 30 YEARS OF COMMAND<br /><br />JUST ONE WEE EXAMPLE CHAATNE KE VAASTE ?<br /><br />HERE WE GO<br /><br />I WAS IN COMMAND OF A HIGH POWERED CONTAINER SHIP DOING 26 KNOTS..<br /><br />THE JAP OWNER HAD A SENIOR JAP SUPERINTENDENT WHO MONITORED THE ENGINE PERFORMANCE EVERY DAY.. HE WAS A CHIEF ENGINEER AT SEA FOR DONKEYS YEARS --AND HE WAS \"THE\" EXPERT..<br /><br />THIS JAP FELLOW --LET US CALL HIM JC ( JAP CUNT ) FOR CLARITY , WHEN HE HAD HIS MENTAL PERIODS , HE WOULD TARGET THE TECH MANAGEMENT COMPANY ( WHO EMPLOYED ME ) FOR OVER STRESSING HIS SHIPs ENGINE.<br /><br />I GUESS IT GAVE HIM CATHARSIS ..<br /><br />HE TREATED THE TECH MANAGEMENT SUPERINTENDENT ENGINEERS LIKE SHIT --AND NOBODY DARED TO TAKE THE JAP ON -- ON THE ENGINEERING ROUTE..<br /><br />AS A LAST RESORT I WAS TOLD TO TAKE OVER COMMAND OF THIS SHIP.. THEY GAVE ME A BRIEF INTRO OF WHAT TO EXPECT.. THEY KNEW CAPTAIN ALWAYS DELIVERS THE GOODS IN HIS OWN UNIQUE STYLE ( MOSTLY ABRASIVE, AS HUMILITY IS NOT MY FUCKIN' FORTE)<br /><br />AS SOON AS I JOINED THE SHIP, I THREW AWAY THE OLD GPS LOG AND STARTED A NEW ONE WITH SOME FANCY COLUMNS WHICH IS NEVER RECORDED ON THE BRIDGE..<br /><br />AS EXPECTED AFTER THREE WEEKS THE JC SEND A MESSAGE TO ME ( TO BE GIVEN TO CHIEF ENGINEER ) DEMANDING AN EXPLANATION WHY THE SHIPs ENGINE WAS OVER STRESSED ..<br /><br />I DID NOT EVEN SHOW THE MESSAGE TO MY CHIEF ENGINEER..<br /><br />I SENT A REPLY WITHIN 5 MINUTES COPIED TO MY TECH MANAGER BOSSES ( ALL ENGINEERS ) CALLING JC A CUNT WHO DID NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF ENGINEERING, AND WONDERING WHY JAPS ARE SUCH CHOOTS ..<br /><br />IF ANY OTHER CAPTAIN HAD DONE THIS HE WOULD BE PAYING FOR HIS OWN AIRFARE AT THE NEXT PORT AS WELL AS THE AIRFARE OF HIS RELIEVER..<br /><br />NOTHING HAPPENED TO ME..<br /><br />I WAS RIGHT<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I THOUGHT OUTSIDE THE BOX ..VADAKAYIL 3D BINDU THINKING..</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-gps-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />IF YOU UNDERSTAND THE CONTENTS OF THE POST ABOVE YOU WILL REALIZE WHY VADAKAYIL SHIT NEVER SMELT AT SEA..<br /><br />COMPETENCE ENHANCES CREDENCE..<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: justify;\">\nWhat are you saying Ajit ji?! Those who only talk stats know shit about cricket! I am following cricket for 19 years day in &amp; day out. I have witnessed the action live &amp; not in a book or a newspaper or a website Greg Chapell was the one responsible for divide &amp; rule. He even went to Sachin during his coaching years and said that if we both get together then we can rule Indian Cricket but Sachin didn't support him in his endeavour. Ganguly is the one person that has revived Indian Cricket after the fixing scandals of 2000. He brought the best out of his players. I will give you instances, He got back retiring Javagal Shrinath back into Indian Team to play World Cup 2003. Also, Dravid was not supposed to be picked in that world cup but he fought with the selectors &amp; played him as a wicket keeper, that masterstroke revived Dravid's ODI Career. Ganguly was the one who picked the not so technical chote sheher ka ladka MS Dhoni &amp; backed him during his initial failures. He was the captain when India defeated the Invincible Aussies in Test Series in 2001. He was the captain when we went to the home ground of Aussies &amp; drew the Test Series 1-1 in a 4 match series. That was by far India's best performance ever and retained Border Gavaskar Trophy. The biggest contribution in winning the 2011 World Cup should be given to Ganguly. He backed Bhajji through out his captaincy. He made that Team! He was responsible for inclusion of young Yuvraj Singh in Champions Trophy of 2000. He was the one who backed the batting style of Sehwag &amp; kept him in the team for a long run.He was the one who backed Injury mein body Ashish Nehra. His contribution was immense in Test Careers of laxman &amp; kumble. Yes he has ego issues. I agree with that but who hasn't? If there was no ego then why would we have been here? 40+ average in those days 1996-2008 is really good. The pitches were not so flat like we had today &amp; the quality of bowlers was much better! He played Akram, Waqar, Shoaib,Walsh, Ambrose, Bond, Caddick,Gough, Donald, Vaas, McGrath, Warne, Murli, Vittori, Saqlain at their peak!I can go on &amp; on &amp; on.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_33BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_33B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_34B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8374417057970977807\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_34M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/07328875349651029194\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Drak</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1520082480384#c8374417057970977807\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">March 3, 2018 at 6:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAbhishek Sharma it's your word vs Captain's word !!<br />\n<br />\nAnd it's really presumptuous to think that Captain is speaking on the basis of stats alone! Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 20, 2017 at 8:26 PM<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE WHO SAILED WITH ME WILL VOUCH THAT CAPTAIN WAS THE GREATEST TASK MASTER AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WILL ALSO VOUCH THAT I BROUGHT GREAT JOY TO HARD DANGEROUS ENERVATING WORK</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">JOY ( BLUE OCEAN LEADERSHIP ) COMES WHEN PEOPLE GET INSPIRED , WHEN THEY UNDERSTAND THE JOB THEY DO</span></div>\n<br />\nonce while dropping anchor off shanghai river --we burnt an aged anchor lining--it was slipping<br />\n<br />\npilot was due in three hours by helicopter<br />\n<br />\ni asked my russian chief officer to change the lining--and there is NO way i will enter the river with one working anchor<br />\n<br />\nhe responded --it will take minimum 12 hours to change the lining<br />\n<br />\ni said yes-- if the team is ONE-- split the team into 3 parts --make sure nobody stands still<br />\n<br />\nand i told him how to go about it<br />\n<br />\nTHE CREW CHANGED THE LINING IN THREE HOURS FLAT<br />\n<br />\nWHILE WE WERE IN THE RIVER CHIEF OFFICER CAME ON THE BRIDGE WITH A SMILE<br />\n<br />\nHE SAYS \" SIR--THE ENTIRE TURKISH / BULGARIAN CREW IS STUNNED --THEY ARE HAVING COFFEE IN THE CREW SMOKE ROOM AND BOASTING ABOUT WHAT THEY DID \"<br />\n<br />\nYES-- INSPIRE, MAKE ORDINARY PEOPLE DO EXTRA ORDINARY THINGS , MAKE THE IMPOSSIBLE SEEN POSSIBLE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AND MOST IMPORTANT<br /><br />BRING JOY TO THE WORKPLACE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nKUMBLE COULD NOT BRING JOY TO THE FIELD<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedCUA0D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedCUA0D\" kind=\"d\"></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9211788139054333503\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Or getting rid of unhealthy ones the only option ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526343092574#c8416199444397109344\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 5:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSEA SICKNESS HAS A LOT TO DO WITH THE SPIRIT LEVEL INSIDE THE INNER EAR ( COCHLEA )<br />\n<br />\nI GET DIZZY WHEN I SIT ON A FAST SPINNING MERRY GO ROUND.. WHILE MY WIFE LOVES IT..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS SEASICK WHEN I FIRST JOINED THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE WAS NEVER SEA SICK EVEN WHEN THE WHOLE SHIPs CREW WAS AFTER A WEEK OF VERY BAD HURRICANE WEATHER ...<br />\n<br />\nIF PAKISTAN ATTACKS INDIA IN JULY --70% OF OUR INDIAN NAVY OFFICERS WILL BE PUKING THEIR GUTS OUT INSTEAD OF FIGHTING.. I KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST THING INDIAN NAVY HAS TO DO IS TO ALLOW WHITE UNIFORMS AND CAPS WHICH FLY OFF IN THE WIND --ONLY FOR CEREMONY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN INS BETWA , THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP CAPSIZED IN MUMBAI LOCK GATE , NOBODY IN THE WHOLE OF INDIAN NAVY KNEW WHAT HAPPENED ... NOT ONE SINGLE MAN SERVING OR RETIRED..<br />\n<br />\nSO CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD TO TELL THEM WHAT HAPPENED..<br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil December 6, 2016 at 1:49 PM<br />\nIMPORTANT....... IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes ).............&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Not many people realise that KM reduces with increase of trim................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block</span>\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE...........&nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the critical period....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a virtual loss in metacentric height and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results.&nbsp;</span>....capt ajit vadakayil ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n############################<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK NIRMALA SITARAMAN TO ADDRESS THE PROBLEM NOW .. PM MODI MUST BE PERSONALLY INVOLVED...<br />\n<br />\nOUR NAVAL OFFICERS LACK CHARACTER AND COMPETENCE... IN MODERN WARS NAVY WINS BATTLES ..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF ( THIS IS A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT ) --<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nNAVAL CHIEF<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nAIRFORCE AND ARMY CHIEFS<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nDEANS OF NAVAL ACADEMIES OF INDIA.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1963767790440763162\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_116M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/10845340191592105290\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Abhay</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_13.html?showComment=1529032173626#c1963767790440763162\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 15, 2018 at 8:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_116MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMaking PhD mandatory to teach in a university is a good idea, but fix PhD quality&nbsp;first<br />\nhttps://www.financialexpress.com/opinion/making-phd-mandatory-to-teach-in-a-university-is-a-good-idea-but-fix-phd-quality-first/1206896/<br />\n-via Opeddiction<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThis article foesdoe mention the quality of students who opt for PhD. , serif;\">I hate to have to say it, but I very firmly feel Maria's not an asset to the abbey</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I'd like to say a word in her behalf</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maria makes me laugh</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you solve a problem like Maria?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you catch a cloud and pin it down?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you find the word that means Maria?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A flibbertijibbet! A will-o'-the wisp! A clown!</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Many a thing you know you'd like to tell her</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Many a thing she ought to understand</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But how do you make her stay and listen to all you say</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you keep a wave upon the sand?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Oh, how do you solve a problem like Maria?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you hold a moonbeam in your hand?</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When I'm with her I'm confused, out of focus and bemused</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And I never know exactly where I am</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Unpredictable as weather, she's as flighty as a feather</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She's a darling! She's a demon! She's a lamb!</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She'd out pester any pest, drive a hornet from its nest</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She could throw a whirling dervish out of whirl</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She is gentle! She is wild! She's a riddle! She's a child!</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She's a headache! She's an angel! She's a girl!</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you solve a problem like Maria?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you catch a cloud and pin it down?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">How do you find the word that means Maria?</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A flibbertijibbet! Will romancing the paradox yield something beyond intellect? Or is it an exercise that only wise undertake? Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1530058944690#c13949005123173667\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 27, 2018 at 5:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME-<br />\n<br />\nFOR IAS WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SUBJECTIVE AND OBJECTIVE EVALUATION OF A CANDIDATE ?<br />\n<br />\nWELL --THE&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">LINK BELOW IS AN OBJECTIVE TEST</span></b>.. IT CAN BE EVALUATED BY A SIMPLE COMPUTER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU GO FOR A DRIVING TEST IN INDIA--YOU FIRST HAVE TO CLEAR THIS TYPE OF OBJECTIVE EXAM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\">A HALF WIT CAN PASS AN OBJECTIVE EXAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHEN WHAT IS A SUBJECTIVE EVALUATION?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BUILDING AN IDEA FROM SCRATCH LIKE AN ESSAY .. THIS ESSAY CAN NEVER BE EVALUATED BY THE COMPUTER ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">A COMPUTER CAN NEVER LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE OR TELL THE MORAL OF A STORY.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR THIS YOU REQUIRE A CONSCIOUS HUMAN BRAIN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSAY-&nbsp; &nbsp;SOMEONE ASKS ME-- WRITE AN ESSAY ABOUT AN EXPERIENCE AT SEA-- IT MUST BE TRUTHFUL , NOT A FANTASY OR FICTION -- IT MUST PACK PUNCH AND SUBTLE WIT.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/true-sea-story-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN I DID JOB INTERVIEWS IT WAS ALWAYS SUBJECTIVE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI SWUNG TO THE EXTREME..<br />\n<br />\nI WOULD GIVE A CHIEF ENGINEER A TECHNICAL ESSAY TO READ AT THE HOTEL.. THEN HE HAS TO COME BACK THE NEXT DAY AND ASK ME QUESTIONS .. I DONT ASK HIM QUESTIONS..</div>\n<div>\nHIS QUESTIONS TO ME DECIDE WHAT HE IS WORTH.. A DUFFER OR INEXPERIENCED FELLOW WILL ASK STUPID QUESTIONS..</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nEXAMPLE:<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-lub-oil-analysis-babitt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/08/instructions-for-overflow-prevention-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN A CANDIDATE HAS TO ASK THE EXAMINER QUESTIONS -- THE EXAMINER MUST BE AN EXPERIENCED EXPERT -- OR IT WILL BACK FIRE BADLY .. DONT EVEN DARE TO TRY THIS<br />\n<br />\nWHERE CONSCIOUS HUMAN PASSION IS INVOLVED \u2013THE EVALUATION BECOME SUBJECTIVE.&nbsp; &nbsp; KOTA CRAM AND VOMIT PARTY , ROBOTS AND SUPER COMPUTERS WILL FAIL IN SUBJECTIVE EVALUATIONS AS INNER CONSCIOUS THOUGHTS ARE CALLED FOR..<br />\n<br />\nOUR JUSTICE SYSTEM IS FOR IDIOTS AND CUNTS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WE CANNOT HAVE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL AT SCHOOL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \u2013 TO BE GIVEN POWERS OVER LIFE AND DEATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">GLEANING TRUTH FROM CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE , UNDERSTANDING CONTEXT , RESPECTING CULTURE AND DELIVERING NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) IS IN THE REALM OF THE SUBJECTIVE.</span><br />\n<br />\nI KEEP IT AT THE LEVEL OF THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR\u2026 FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT THINKERS OR PHILOSOPHERS<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA WHEN STUPID TECHNICAL BOSSES ASK ME \u201c WHY DID YOU DO THAT\u201d\u2014&nbsp; I JUST TELL THEM OFF&nbsp; &nbsp;\u201cI AM THE CAPTAIN , MERA MARRJJI \u2013YOU WONT EVEN UNDERSTAND IF I EXPLAIN IT TO YOU \u201c<br />\n<br />\nMY TECHNICAL ENGINEERING BOSSES KNEW WHAT WAS GOOD FOR THEM..<br />\n<br />\nFOR IF THEY PISSED OFF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL, THEY KNEW HE CAN TAKE OUT ONE TECHICAL CIRCULAR A DAY ( WRITTEN BY HIM ) AND TAKE IT APART , AND MAKE HIM LOOK LIKE A MENTAL RETARD IN THE OFFICE LEAVING HIM NO OPTION BUT TO RESIGN ..<br />\n<br />\nNEVER LOSE RESPECT AT THE OFFICE \u2013THUMB RULE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_64M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526343092574#c8416199444397109344\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 5:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSEA SICKNESS HAS A LOT TO DO WITH THE SPIRIT LEVEL INSIDE THE INNER EAR ( COCHLEA )<br />\n<br />\nI GET DIZZY WHEN I SIT ON A FAST SPINNING MERRY GO ROUND.. WHILE MY WIFE LOVES IT..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS SEASICK WHEN I FIRST JOINED THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE WAS NEVER SEA SICK EVEN WHEN THE WHOLE SHIPs CREW WAS AFTER A WEEK OF VERY BAD HURRICANE WEATHER ...<br />\n<br />\nIF PAKISTAN ATTACKS INDIA IN JULY --70% OF OUR INDIAN NAVY OFFICERS WILL BE PUKING THEIR GUTS OUT INSTEAD OF FIGHTING.. I KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST THING INDIAN NAVY HAS TO DO IS TO ALLOW WHITE UNIFORMS AND CAPS WHICH FLY OFF IN THE WIND --ONLY FOR CEREMONY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN INS BETWA , THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP CAPSIZED IN MUMBAI LOCK GATE , NOBODY IN THE WHOLE OF INDIAN NAVY KNEW WHAT HAPPENED ... NOT ONE SINGLE MAN SERVING OR RETIRED..<br />\n<br />\nSO CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD TO TELL THEM WHAT HAPPENED..<br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil December 6, 2016 at 1:49 PM<br />\nIMPORTANT....... IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes ).............&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Not many people realise that KM reduces with increase of trim................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block</span>\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE...........&nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the critical period....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a virtual loss in metacentric height and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results.&nbsp;</span>....capt ajit vadakayil ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n############################<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK NIRMALA SITARAMAN TO ADDRESS THE PROBLEM NOW .. PM MODI MUST BE PERSONALLY INVOLVED...<br />\n<br />\nOUR NAVAL OFFICERS LACK CHARACTER AND COMPETENCE... IN MODERN WARS NAVY WINS BATTLES ..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF ( THIS IS A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT ) --<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nNAVAL CHIEF<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nAIRFORCE AND ARMY CHIEFS<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nDEANS OF NAVAL ACADEMIES OF INDIA.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2396500117999135993\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: medium;\"><b>\" FOOKING CHINAMAN \"..&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nSAME WAY--<br />\n<br />\nEVER SINCE I ATTENDED SCHOOL, AND TILL I RETIRED FROM SEA -- THE TOP GUN WAS MY FAN ( MY SHIT DID NOT SMELL FOR HIM ) ,<br />\n<br />\nTHE MIDDLE MANAGEMENT HATED ME LIKE THE PLAGUE ( THEY HATED MY GUTS )<br />\n<br />\nAND THE BOTTOM MANAGEMENT LOVED ME ( THEY KNEW I WAS BETTER THAN THE ENTIRE MIDDLE MANAGEMENT IN COMPETENCE AND THEY LOVED MY GUTS OF DEALING WITH THE HATERS WITH THE SWORD OF DAMOCLES SELF INFLICTED OVER MY HEAD ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/blue-ocean-leadership-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE MIDDLE MANAGEMENT WOULD GET DRUNK ( ON SUNDAYS ) WHILE THEY DISCUSSED HOW TO SCREW ME -- AND THEN THE END RESULT WAS \"&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1551814162779#c2541197152540096488\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 6, 2019 at 12:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME UP AND SAID<br />\n<br />\nHE SPOKE TO SOMEONE AT SEA WHO KNEW ME WELL FOR YEARS<br />\n<br />\nHE SAYS IT IS TRUE THAT CAPTAIN KICKED THE COLLECTIVE BALLS OF ALL HIS SHORE BOSSES AND NOBODY DARED TO SACK HIM..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE SECRET ?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE ALWAYS TOLD MY JUNIOR OFFICERS WHO TOLD ME \" YOU ARE MY ROLE MODEL SIR\" THAT I AM A POOR ROLE MODEL.. NEVER BE MY CLONE.. YOU WILL SUFFER PAIN AND DISGRACE<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECRET WAS EXTREME COMPETENCE POWERED BY LUCK- AS MY FAR FETCHED PREDICTIONS ALWAYS CAME TRUE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BUT THE REAL REASON WAS --&nbsp; WHICH EVER COMPANY I SERVED, I WAS THEIR NO 1 AND ONLY TROUBLE SHOOTER ..</span></b><br />\nTHERE ARE HUNDREDS OF CASES OVER 30 YEARS OF COMMAND<br />\n<br />\nJUST ONE WEE EXAMPLE CHAATNE KE VAASTE ?<br />\n<br />\nHERE WE GO<br />\n<br />\nI WAS IN COMMAND OF A HIGH POWERED CONTAINER SHIP DOING 26 KNOTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE JAP OWNER HAD A SENIOR JAP SUPERINTENDENT WHO MONITORED THE ENGINE PERFORMANCE EVERY DAY.. HE WAS A CHIEF ENGINEER AT SEA FOR DONKEYS YEARS --AND HE WAS \"THE\" EXPERT..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS JAP FELLOW --LET US CALL HIM JC ( JAP CUNT ) FOR CLARITY , WHEN HE HAD HIS MENTAL PERIODS , HE WOULD TARGET THE TECH MANAGEMENT COMPANY ( WHO EMPLOYED ME ) FOR OVER STRESSING HIS SHIPs ENGINE.<br />\n<br />\nI GUESS IT GAVE HIM CATHARSIS ..<br />\n<br />\nHE TREATED THE TECH MANAGEMENT SUPERINTENDENT ENGINEERS LIKE SHIT --AND NOBODY DARED TO TAKE THE JAP ON -- ON THE ENGINEERING ROUTE..<br />\n<br />\nAS A LAST RESORT I WAS TOLD TO TAKE OVER COMMAND OF THIS SHIP.. THEY GAVE ME A BRIEF INTRO OF WHAT TO EXPECT.. THEY KNEW CAPTAIN ALWAYS DELIVERS THE GOODS IN HIS OWN UNIQUE STYLE ( MOSTLY ABRASIVE, AS HUMILITY IS NOT MY FUCKIN' FORTE)<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS I JOINED THE SHIP, I THREW AWAY THE OLD GPS LOG AND STARTED A NEW ONE WITH SOME FANCY COLUMNS WHICH IS NEVER RECORDED ON THE BRIDGE..<br />\n<br />\nAS EXPECTED AFTER THREE WEEKS THE JC SEND A MESSAGE TO ME ( TO BE GIVEN TO CHIEF ENGINEER ) DEMANDING AN EXPLANATION WHY THE SHIPs ENGINE WAS OVER STRESSED ..<br />\n<br />\nI DID NOT EVEN SHOW THE MESSAGE TO MY CHIEF ENGINEER..<br />\n<br />\nI SENT A REPLY WITHIN 5 MINUTES COPIED TO MY TECH MANAGER BOSSES ( ALL ENGINEERS ) CALLING JC A CUNT WHO DID NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF ENGINEERING, AND WONDERING WHY JAPS ARE SUCH CHOOTS ..<br />\n<br />\nIF ANY OTHER CAPTAIN HAD DONE THIS HE WOULD BE PAYING FOR HIS OWN AIRFARE AT THE NEXT PORT AS WELL AS THE AIRFARE OF HIS RELIEVER..<br />\n<br />\nNOTHING HAPPENED TO ME..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS RIGHT<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I THOUGHT OUTSIDE THE BOX ..VADAKAYIL 3D BINDU THINKING..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-gps-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIF YOU UNDERSTAND THE CONTENTS OF THE POST ABOVE YOU WILL REALIZE WHY VADAKAYIL SHIT NEVER SMELT AT SEA..<br />\n<br />\nCOMPETENCE ENHANCES CREDENCE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_95B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529923260525#c4042313217843790286\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 25, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_99MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPARADOX IS THE ONLY TRUTH.<br />\n<br />\nONLY THINKERS CAN GLEAN IT.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO BLACKS AND WHITE IN LIFE AND NATURE.. THEY HAVE GREY SHADES ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">PARADOX IS THE CHILD OF TRUTH..BEYOND THE VEIL OF MAYA.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN DVAITA VEDANTA THE CREATOR AND DESTROYER INTERCHANGES ROES SEAMLESSLY<br /><br />TILL A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL CAME ON THE SCENE NOBODY ON THIS PLANET KNEW WHAT IS DVAITA VEDANTA.. THIS CONCEPT DIED AFTER VEDAS WERE PENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html<br /><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta</span><br />\n<br />\nTILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL CAME ON THE SCEENE , NOBODY EVEN KNEW THAT ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ( EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS VAMANA/ PARASHURAMA/ RAMA/ KRISHNA/ AYYAPPA )<br />\n<br />\nNO LIFE ON PLANET EARTH IS POSSIBLE WITHOUT THE PUSH AND PULL\u2014NAY\u2014THE SUBTLE TENSION OF MAYA.<br />\n<br />\nThe term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: x-small;\"></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_99MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">LAXMAN REKHA CONTROLS PARADOX.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/paradox-truth-in-reverse-capt-ajit.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">In OM, the semi circle is open at the top, and does not touch the dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by maya.</span></span></div>\n<br />AT SEA SAILORS WHO KNOW ME WILL VOUCH \u2013CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL BLED HIS SHORE BOSSES WHO PLAYED AROUND WITH THE LAXMAN REKHA..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ONLY THINKERS MUST ROMANCE PARADOX OR THE LAXMAN REKHA&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />I AM JUST WRITING 0.001 %.. Epic !!!! :D</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_83MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-388877552\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_83BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_83B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_84B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c699675596539202339\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535293944264#c699675596539202339\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 8:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nEXCERPT FROM MY KARVA CHAUTH POST--<br />\n<br />\n######################<br />\n<br />\nBy the way, I saw some chutney Marys and Pickle Johns discussing in their blogs why my wife is such a silent poor lamb.<br />\n<br />\nI got to know this true story from my wife\u2019s class mate who was with my wife right through school to college -- LKG to BA . She had come to my house at Calicut with her husband for a 2 day holiday .<br />\n<br />\nThis is what she told me.<br />\n<br />\nMy wife was always a class leader and later on the school leader. Whenever the nuns at Auxilium convent, wanted to give a bad girl who was heading for hell , a good role model , it would be my wife.<br />\n<br />\nThese nuns , due to sexual repression were very MEAN.<br />\n<br />\nThey would NOT allow the girls to touch the walls, in as much as even while climbing the stairs they had to be in the middle with hands tucked in.<br />\n<br />\nSo that had this school march past in Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nWhen they went for a dress rehearsal for this republic day parade , with dozens of other schools, some boys jeered loudly when the Auxilium contingent marched past.<br />\n<br />\nThis was put to a debate, with my wife mediating , not like Arnab Goswami , who will push his opinion ahead of others, even as a debate moderator. I wish I had a tete a tete with this man on national TV. I can cure his self obsession in just 5 minutes.<br />\n<br />\nOne good lookin' Catholic girl ( most of the group were Catholics ) , cried copious tears and was disconsolate .<br />\n<br />\nShe was of ze humble but firm opinion that all other girls from other schools were smartly turned out, while the Auxlium girls were NOT.<br />\n<br />\nAnd to add to her woes hey boy friend was the leader of the hooting party.<br />\n<br />\nWhen asked to be more objective\u2014the girl said , that other school girls wore miniskirts, while Auxilium convent girls, wore their bottom hems 2 inches below the mangy knees.<br />\n<br />\nSo my wife took an instant decision.<br />\n<br />\nHundreds of safety pins would be procured- el pronto .<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as the nuns left them alone , as the girls moved to the huge march past ground. Every girl would shorten the next girl\u2019s skirt by folding it inwards and pinning with six pins, to observe thigh display parity with other school girls.<br />\n<br />\nThey practiced it , so that they would do it in less than 2 minutes .<br />\n<br />\nMind you, my wife was the leader with the school flag.<br />\n<br />\nThe same rowdy boys clapped and whistled in appreciation when the real march past took place.<br />\n<br />\nAnd all including the chief guest were wondering , what the fu#k happened . They thought that the Auxilium contingent would be the prettiest, and indeed they were.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE NUNS GOT WILD AND FROTHED FROM THEIR MOUSTACHED MOUTHS AND PROBABLY THEIR PANTILESS TWATS TOO, FOR GOOD MEASURE \u2014 SURELY THERE IS NO PLACE IN HEAVEN FOR SUCH WANTON GIRLS.<br />\n<br />\nEvery girl was SEVERELY scolded , with my wife bearing the brunt , about how Jesus is so angry with them. They felt let down that my wife who was a graceful role model , was in cahoots .<br />\n<br />\nAll the girls were arbitrarily suspended from school and their parents had to come the next day.<br />\n<br />\nThe parents had their own dress rehearsal. Some of them were IAS, some police, some lawyers, some even MLA s and media giants .<br />\n<br />\nThe parents decided to go for scorched earth tactics--on the advise of a high court lawyer .<br />\n<br />\nThey would threaten to get the school shut down , by creating a stink in the media with demand for the PMS ridden head mistress nun to be sacked.<br />\n<br />\nNeedless to say, the nuns had weak hearts and less faith in their Lord, when the chips were down .<br />\n<br />\nThe fall out was that my wife was sacked as the school leader - rather she declined the job .<br />\n<br />\nBut when the annual prize distribution came, my wife got the most thunderous ovation, pissing off the holy , but MEAN nuns.<br />\n<br />\nSo poor wife of Capt Ajit Vadakayil\u2014she does NOT have a mind of her own, she is a slave, she will be a bad mother in law, right?<br />\n<br />\nWRONG !<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_84MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_84BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; THREE CADETS WHO GOT LEAST MARKS FOR OFFICER LIKE QUALITIES..<br />\n<br />\nI FELL FOUL OF THE LAW --EVERY TIME.. I WAS NOT A TROUBLE MAKER.. JUST MY SPIRIT SHONE THROUGH AND THEY DID NOT LIKE IT..<br />\n<br />\nIN MY FINAL PASSING OUT CERTIFICATE , I GOT EXTRA FIRST GRADE IN ALL SUBJECTS / EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES EVALUATED WITH A THIRD CLASS IN OLQ ( OFFICER LIKE QUALITIES )..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS \"GRACED TO FIRST \"-- PROBABLY THE FIRST TIME THIS EVER HAPPENED EVER SINCE WORLD WAR 1 ..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS IN THE SOCCER TEAM ( SELECTED AMONG 250 CADETS ) IN JUNIOR AS WELL AS SENIOR FORM..PLUS IN EVERY TEAM IN OUR TOP ( ROWING/ SAILING / SIGNALLING/ WRITING / REPORTING/ PAINTING -- ETC )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_86b+seedDuXiD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_86b+seedDuXiD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; TEE HEEEEEEEE..<br />\n<br />\nDIPAK MISRA WILL TAKE A FLIGHT TO CAPITAL OF IDNIA DELHI BECAUSE IT IS WRITTEN IN THE ADMISSION FORM \u201cFILL UP IN CAPITAL\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU\u2014<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS NO LAUGHING MATTER<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE WORLD RUNS THIS WAY\u2014HIJACKED BY KOSHER BIG BROTHER..<br />\n<br />\nAN EXAMPLE AMONG HUNDREDS \u2013 WHICH I ENFORCED AGAINST ALL ODDS\u2014FIGHTING ALONE ?<br />\n<br />\nSAILORS AT SEA WERE ARM TWISTED TO SPRAY METHANOL/ TOLUENE INSIDE STAINLESS STELL CHEMICAL TANKS.. DO IT OR GET SACKED.. HUNDREDS OF THIRD WORLD SAILORS DIED INSIDE TANKS .. IT WAS ALL HUSHED UP..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARDS IN POWER HIJACKED THE TERM IN THE RULE BOOK \u201d LUNG DEMAND TIME\u201d AND CONVERTED IT TO WORKING TIME\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nRESCUE breathing apparatus sets are not for WORKING in the literal sense.<br />\n<br />\n\" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nI STOPPED THE DANGEROUS PRACTICE OF TOLUENE SPRAY.. WHICH HAS CAUSED DOZENS OF TANK EXPLOSIONS DUE TO STATIC ELECTRICITY KILLING HUNDRED OF SAILORS\u2026 ALL THIS WAS HUSHED UP ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/05/toluene-floating-on-chemical-tankers.html<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU, THIS IS JUST ONE EXAMPLE OF HUNDREDS OF ITEMS IT SET RIGHT\u2014BY PUTTING MY OWN HEAD ON THE CHOPPING BLOCK..<br />\n<br />\nI TAUNTED \u201c TAKE ME ON , IF YOU HAVE BALLS , YOU BASTARDS \u201c<br />\n<br />\nONE MORE EXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE FIRST TO BRING ATTENTION TO HYPOCHRORITE FIRES ON CONTAINER SHIPS..
