margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">which requires virus filters, you crew can get scalded badly&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">without proper waders, while sweeping at the bellmouth sudden&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">stop of Framo impeller can cause a vacuum in the stack due to&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">falling column causing liquid&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">flashing into hot vapour, too much</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">difference between&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">temperatures inside and outside tanks can&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">cause back ache and cramps , you can have a stupid and over&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\"><br />\n</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: large;\">zealous shore surveyor etc&nbsp;</span></span></span></i></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Personnel should wear all necessary&nbsp;PPE&nbsp;prior to entering the tank(s).<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Personnel should enter the tank when the cargo level drops below the framing but above the heating coils (approximately&nbsp;0.5m of cargo remaining).<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Agitation and mixing of the cargo by personnel in the tanks should continue until the tank is pumped dry. If heavy&nbsp;clingage&nbsp;is apparent on the tank bulkheads and stringers, wash down this residue with cargo from the tank by re-circulating from the offshore manifold via a hand hose back into the tank.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">During the \u201csqueezing\u201d (sweeping) operations a person must be standing by at the pump controls to adjust the discharge rate according to the progress of the operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Immediately on completion of the \u201csqueezing\u201d (sweeping) operations, all equipment used should be thoroughly cleaned. Footwear should be changed immediately on evacuating the tank in order to prevent the spread of residues overall.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Sweeping high MP palm oils heated to high&nbsp;dischg&nbsp;temperature requires close supervision . Sweeping equipment and waders must be kept in readiness and tank dry surveyor must be available to declare when enough is enough.&nbsp;&nbsp;Remember once the cargo falls below the level of steam coils things must happen the way it is desired, before it solidifies.</span><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">FFA&nbsp;of certain heating cargoes cargoes will increase if the moisture content is too high. Veg and animal oils have different&nbsp;SG&nbsp;at different levels after long storage.&nbsp;FFA&nbsp;of the layer closest to the coils increases faster and cause damage to the bottom\u2014so&nbsp;recirc&nbsp;&nbsp;Vegetable oil and Animal oil in coated cargo tanks. Advantages are less manual labour for squeezing.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Before anybody enters an empty tank for squeezing , it must be ventilated and a gas measurement carried out. Oxidation processes may lead to a life-threatening shortage of O<sub>2</sub>.&nbsp;Contact of oils and fats with oxygen, present in the atmosphere, causes chemical changes in the product which downgrade the quality. Much can be gained by reducing the amount of air contact . Oxidation proceeds more rapidly as temperature increases, so each operation should be carried out at the lowest practicable temperature</span><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">If&nbsp;vsl&nbsp;is discharging high MP cargoes the surveyor must be present at stripping/ sweeping time.</span><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">If you do puddling after wearing approved heat resistant boots reaching above the knees, the&nbsp;squeegeing&nbsp;effort later,&nbsp;&nbsp;becomes a lot easier.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><b><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;FOSFA</span></b><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">FOSFA&nbsp;stands for ------Federation of oil seeds &amp; fats association.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Internationally 85% of global trade in oils and fats is under&nbsp;FOSFA&nbsp;terms, as they claim in their web site. They have about 57 banned cargoes and 104 acceptable cargoes in their list.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">NIOP&nbsp;stands for-------National institute of oil seeds production ( A&amp;B)<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Both these agencies have an acceptable and banned list of previous cargoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Edible oils can be booked only under one of the above 4.&nbsp;Find out which list is valid/&nbsp;FOSFA&nbsp;acceptable or banned.&nbsp;Master to ensure in writing.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">FOSFA&nbsp;and&nbsp;NIOP&nbsp;may not agree with each other. The list are revised regularly and make sure you have the latest if you cant find the chemical name.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Other lists are EU, Procter &amp; Gamble and Kosher.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">EU list is between members of the European union, and they like to keep things stricter than&nbsp;FOSFA.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">For Procter and Gamble , zinc tanks are not accepted for fatty acids.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Kosher list is a small one for Jews . When you load acetic acid , crude&nbsp;Glycerine&nbsp;&nbsp;etc you can have a couple Rabbis on deck to do some ceremony. After this ceremony the value of the cargo goes up&nbsp;multifold, hence ensure that the ship staff&nbsp;&nbsp;co-operates and do not quote some safety/ security rule and drive the souls away. They will also need to watch the entire process of loading and seal the tank openings. For Kosher, the last 3 cannot be Tallow or Tallow derivative , Fish oil or Wine.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">No closed blisters or loose splits shall be allowed in a coated cargo tank. Mild steel exposure in coated tanks shall be reduced to a minimum and in no case can have loose rust.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Tankcleaning&nbsp;solvents must be accepted as previous cargo. You will be required to give a written&nbsp;tankcleaning&nbsp;history. Nitric acid is a&nbsp;FOSFA&nbsp;banned chemical.&nbsp;BSolve&nbsp;is an&nbsp;NIOP&nbsp;banned chemical.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Styrene and&nbsp;EDC&nbsp;are banned as last 2 cargoes in epoxy tanks. Both are banned as last cargo in stainless steel and zinc tanks.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">NIOP&nbsp;does not permit lead products like leaded gasoline as the last three. When you carry gasoline ensure you get the lead content in writing.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Proper sampling procedures incl foot sampling of cargo&nbsp;tansk&nbsp;is called for.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Last 3 should be&nbsp;atleast&nbsp;60 percent by volume of the tank in case the fourth last&nbsp;&nbsp;previous cargo is banned.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Recoated&nbsp;cargo tanks are considered as&nbsp;newbuildings.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">A statement in the form of&nbsp;FOSFA&nbsp;\u2018 international ship\u2019s&nbsp;qualification&nbsp;combined&nbsp;&nbsp;master\u2019s certificate\u2019 signed by master/ mate shall be provided for the shipper, certifying that the ship is qualified for the coming voyage with edible oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">There is no difference between oils and fats---only that fats are solid at room temperatures.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fatty acids and&nbsp;Carboxylic&nbsp;acids are present in animal and veg oils. Most veg oils are mixtures of several fatty acids.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">FOSFA&nbsp;requires ships to follow&nbsp;IASC&nbsp;heating instructions, which means no use of thermal heating fluids other than water and steam.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 15.0pt; margin-right: 20.45pt; margin-top: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span></div><div class=\"Default\"><b><u><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\">TYPES OF VEGETABLE OILS </span></u></b><span "published": "2010-11-22T08:37:00+05:30", "updated": "2012-07-04T13:14:45+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzQxMzg3ODg1MDkxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/crop-circles-mystery-solved-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6893853876393792354", "title": "CROP CIRCLES MYSTERY SOLVED--   CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">MYSTERY OF CROP CIRCLES SOLVED- &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></b><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbFXPWFCI/AAAAAAAAAkU/d-8PxZX2M38/s1600/tunguska+3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbFXPWFCI/AAAAAAAAAkU/d-8PxZX2M38/s1600/tunguska+3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\"></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbKT5cS7I/AAAAAAAAAkY/WXg5O790gYs/s1600/tunguska2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbKT5cS7I/AAAAAAAAAkY/WXg5O790gYs/s1600/tunguska2.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\"></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbO2brcnI/AAAAAAAAAkc/ABPfQTqFk-w/s1600/tunguska.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOnbO2brcnI/AAAAAAAAAkc/ABPfQTqFk-w/s1600/tunguska.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\"></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">The first \" crop circle \" on this planet was made by super genius Nikola Tesla at Tunguska.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">In 1908 when Tesla tested the foreboding weapon-- &nbsp;his scalar wave howitzer, a type of particle accelerator .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">At the time, Robert Peary was making his second attempt to reach the North Pole, and Tesla had told him that he would see something spectacular.&nbsp;On the evening of June 30, accompanied by his associate George Scherff atop Wardenclyffe tower, Tesla aimed his scalar death ray across the Atlantic towards the arctic, to a spot which he calculated was west of the Peary expedition.</span><span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\nHis&nbsp;Howitzer&nbsp;overshot its target-- and it caused a massive explosion equivalent &nbsp;to 45 Mega tons of TNT at Tunguska Siberia---the likes of which has never been experienced by this planet till now. The explosion was heard 700 miles away and it formed a huge crater which is still examined by all scientists . </div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">Alarmed at the danger this posed to this planet the true Martyr to science (and the only one on this planet) &nbsp;Nikola Tesla quietly dismantled his howitzer.</span><span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\nCheck out the trees swirled and flattened in the dense forest in the 2nd back and white picture from top --exactly like the modern day crop circle in a corn field. Sceptics called it a meteor strike--while NO&nbsp;remnants&nbsp;of a meteor has ever been found at the site till date.<span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\nCIA and the US military tried to steal his technology for a future star wars programme-- the modern day HAARP, which in addition to scorching any spot on earth , can shoot any incoming missiles and also doctor the ionosphere to engineer weather , cause earth quakes or&nbsp;volcano&nbsp;eruptions or do mind control.&nbsp;<span style=\"color: black;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">When Tesla refused to play ball, he was buried to history--and denied a Nobel prize for lighting up the world with AC electricity. The average electron density around the oxygen atom in a water molecule is about 10 times that around the hydrogen atoms. This non uniform distribution of positive and negative charges or strong DIPOLE present in water leads to the substance\u2019s unusual behavior.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">A single molecule of water looks like a letter V at an angle of 105 deg , with one oxygen atom at the bottom point and two hydrogen atoms at the top. These atoms share some of their negatively charged electrons, forming a strong connection called a covalent bond. THIS DIPOLE CAUSES IMMENSE SCALAR ENERGY TO USHER IN AND OUT OF ZERO POINT FIELD.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQXgLxDjSyI/AAAAAAAABzY/nr_uTIULWbs/s1600/water+io5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"190\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQXgLxDjSyI/AAAAAAAABzY/nr_uTIULWbs/s320/water+io5.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">All water crystals have 6 branches--but NO two are alike. This water is good for the human body.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQjTCQ4HAzI/AAAAAAAACAs/Y2Hr-sk6zyk/s1600/fig2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TQjTCQ4HAzI/AAAAAAAACAs/Y2Hr-sk6zyk/s1600/fig2.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxe7Pd6-8I/AAAAAAAAAqY/Wwn1ys5JgCA/s1600/4611125-Manmatha_Tank-Hampi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxe7Pd6-8I/AAAAAAAAAqY/Wwn1ys5JgCA/s400/4611125-Manmatha_Tank-Hampi.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">All Hindu temples are located near a water body. The properties of Ganges water and Zam Zam water from Mecca is well known.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Even a small amount of water has enough cluster structures available to absorb whole libraries of information ( theertham in a rishi\u2019s copper lota ).</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I would not be surprised if in the future Silicon valley is renamed as Water valley. For water can store information about substances that were once in it but that have physically disappeared. Latest generation computer robotic research is investigating water's capacity to order and transmit information, as an improvement to silicon. Water should be the source of energy in the future via energy carrier hydrogen.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxjcA4-arI/AAAAAAAAAq0/tbx4EhNye38/s1600/images+%252832%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"253\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxjcA4-arI/AAAAAAAAAq0/tbx4EhNye38/s400/images+%252832%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water is the very source of all life . The quality of our life depends on it. 97% of water on this planet is salt water. Out of the balance 3% fresh water, 2/3 is ice.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water is colourless, odourless and tasteless at room temperature.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 65% of the human body. Brain is 83% water, blood-92%, kidneys - 82%, liver-69% , muscles-75%, bones-28%.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">50 to 90% weight of living organisms is water.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Our brain stores information in the holographic form. Every cell in our body carries all information to produce a copy.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Without water, the blood wont move. A human being will die within 3 days of being deprived of water, as cells, blood and tissues are deprived of the water content. Water is the lubricant of all moving parts in the body. All cells are water cooled.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In homeopathy the information copied to the water is being used to cancel out the information of the symptoms from the disease -- a wave cancellation effect. Water is the master listener in the universe -- and you are mostly water. The gravity of the moon affects the tides just like the periods of a woman.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water has an unusually large heat capacity, requiring a lot of energy to increase its temperature. This characteristic prevents Earth from getting too hot or too cold, and it slows the temperature changes in oceans, biological cells, and tissues, making conditions possible for life. Water is one of the best known solvents .</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Liquid water absorbs radiation of all wavelengths, except a narrow window in the visible (photochemical) waveband. This window is critical for photolysis and directly or indirectly influences the development of all life on Earth.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water\u2019s high thermal conductivity speeds up heat redistribution in living tissues, which helps protect the body from uneven heating and cooling, whether such changes are caused by metabolic processes or external mechanisms.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxfY0FMC6I/AAAAAAAAAqc/-AIWinzjTLE/s1600/images+%252828%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"391\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxfY0FMC6I/AAAAAAAAAqc/-AIWinzjTLE/s400/images+%252828%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Though water freezes at zero deg C , however if it is kept inside the capillaries which have the dimensions less than a hair thickness, it will remain fluid even at a very low temperature below zero. In areas of the earth where water freezes at night and thaws again in the morning, we find the toughest rocks splitting and being broken down. Ice melts when slight pressure is applied, but under high pressure, liquid freezes. If you open a bottle of pressurized soda water, it will freeze instantly. Water is the only substance that has its highest density as a liquid.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water also has a high heat of vaporization, so a lot of energy from the Sun is needed to turn liquid water into vapor. It takes four times as much energy to heat a given mass of water by 1\u00b0C as it does to heat the same mass of dry air. Perspiration is the most effective way to cool the human body. Water bodies in the tropics&nbsp;don't&nbsp;get evaporated so quickly.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">As temperature increases, a substance\u2019s density generally decreases. But pure water is an exception to this rule\u2014it is the only known substance that has its highest density as a liquid. It is the only natural substance found in all three states -- solid, liquid and gas -- within the range of natural Earth temperatures.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">It has very high surface tension (helping it move through roots and capillaries -- vital to maintaining life on Earth) and is virtually incompressible. Because of the internal tension of water it can drag itself upwards through tall trees without breaking off in its upwards flow. This upwards flow is caused by the water flowing out of the leaves into the air, pulling more water up as it does so . The high surface tension of water - its tendency to fight being pulled apart - explains why it forms droplets and why it climbs up the sides of a straw.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">A well-known anomaly of water is that its density is highest at four degrees Celsius above the freezing point. Thus, ice floats on water, whereas the solid state of other compounds would sink in their liquids. This permits life to survive safely under the&nbsp;ice during&nbsp;freezing weather. Ice would sink to the bottom of the sea otherwise , away from the melting warmth of the sunshine. Unlike other liquids, water expands in freezing.Completely pure water is a poor conductor of electricity</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water is the universal medium for all biological activity; it dissolves, dilutes, transports, and reacts with every chemical essential for life. Cell-associated water (vicinal water) has different properties than ordinary water. It is less dense, requires more energy to heat, has greater viscosity, and different phase change temperatures.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The most mysterious and controversial property of water, however, is its ability to hold and store memory. This property underlies the healing capability of homeopathy. A homeopathic solution usually in water is produced via a series of dilutions of a substance, often until effectively no atoms of the original material remain. Only an imprint or memory remains for the cure, and the greater the dilution, the greater the effectiveness. The experiments showed that the immune system can be triggered using hundred times dilutions of an aqueous solution of an antibody.. If water has a memory then the water we drink is transferring its memory into our \"water body,\" just like a homeopathic solution does.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Human vibrational energy, thoughts, words, ideas and music, affect the molecular structure of water, The body is very much like a sponge and is composed of trillions of chambers called cells that hold liquid. &nbsp;In this sense water not only has the ability to visually reflect the environment but it also molecularly reflects the environment. Miracle waters have been discovered throughout the world and have been responsible for thousands of unexplainable healings.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water registers precise molecular information about the world around it, and that is extremely sensitive to these frequencies coming into it.Water remembers, or stores this information, and that it can transport this into new environments when it travels through various water cycles. The oceans have a water cycle where vast internal rivers,that we call ocean currents, flow through all the salt&nbsp;waters of&nbsp;our world, carrying warm and cold waters to affect various countries' weather patterns, flora and fauna.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">These enormously powerful currents dive down kilometers deep into the watery darkness when they cool near the ice caps and then rise again thousands of miles away in warm waters, spreading food worldwide for what used to be a stupendously rich marine life. Water can wipe out previous molecular energy information and start afresh, starting anew in the present moment to receive the latest upgrade, so to speak. Water appears to have a type of thinking capacity within itself as a freely moving liquid&nbsp;without a nervous system needing to be formed. Water responds to subtle events even far out in the cosmos and that it is a far more sensitive medium for reception .</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">It is also known that water receives cosmic radiation as extreme low frequencies everywhere, even deep down five kilometres below the sea, creating resonances or vibrations that are healing and healthy for nature since the world began. the moon, the sun and even the stars communicate with water, and our earth itself is retuning its resonances constantly to this influx. Water molecules group together in vast numbers of unusually long 'cluster structures', and these can vibrate like a musical instrument receiving and giving off a wide variety of differing frequencies.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water has high dielectric constant or relative permitivity of 81. This means the force of attraction between ions is 81 times lesser in water than in vacuum, and this allows them to separate. High dielectric constant is equivalent of high insulating properties, to lower the attraction between oppositely charged ions, once they are solvated.. Thus, water is a powerful solvent and a medium for biochemical reactions. It is the universal solvent, being one of the best solvents we have, with 84 out of the known 103 elements on this planet being dissolved by it.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">If you get pure coherent water flowing fast enough it can cut metal. Water jets are able to cut because the spray is channeled through a very narrow jeweled nozzle at a very high pressure to keep the spray coherent. Unlike metal cutters, a water jet never gets dull and it cannot overheat.. The latest machines can cut to within less than a half a mm, and have jet speeds around Mach 3.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxgZbDoBvI/AAAAAAAAAqo/x9Nj92kiO1E/s1600/images+%252831%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxgZbDoBvI/AAAAAAAAAqo/x9Nj92kiO1E/s1600/images+%252831%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The nozzle is a diamond hole. A water jet can cut a \"sandwich\" of different materials up to four inches thick. This odorless, dust-free and relatively heat-free process can also cut something as thin as half a mm. The tiny jet stream permits the first cut to also be the final finished surface. This single cutting process saves material costs and machining costs.. The water pressure is typically around 4000 bars.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">A water jet can strip paint at a distance of 15 metres of if you alter the chemistry of plain water by adding a soluble polymeric chemical that acts like a series of molecular spinal columns or concrete reinforcement bars that tie the individual water molecules together in a more structured way to form a coherent jet.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxgK0Ukj3I/AAAAAAAAAqk/VxzqpVl87dY/s1600/images+%252830%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"250\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxgK0Ukj3I/AAAAAAAAAqk/VxzqpVl87dY/s400/images+%252830%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Abrasive water jets , using diamond powder abrasive, cut into the hard hull of the submarine Kursk to recover the bodies of the Russian crew . This abrasive jet has an internal ruby orifice to produce a thin dia jet of water capable of cutting materials over half a metre thickness of steel while producing a taper of less than 1 degree with Ultra High Pressure Water of 6000 bars produced by a Water jet Intensifier Pump</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Nobel prize winner Alex Carrel (who kept a chicken heart tissue alive for 37 years) had said that the secret of life is to feed and nourish the cells and let the flush the waste and toxins. &nbsp;<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">To achieve toxin release efficiently with minimum quantity of water you must lower the surface tension of water from 73 dynes to 45 dynes</span>. You can drink a large quantity of high tension water, -- it is NO use.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">If you drink water that\u2019s harmonious to the human body, water will pass through the body within ten to 15 minutes. The (harmonious) water will carry out toxins. Ordinary water has a surface tension of 73 dynes per centimeter, our body cells require 45 for fast permeation and hydration. If the ST is too high, the cell drowns in its own waste products as there will be less flushing action. Scalar energy from the DNA of healers reduce the surface tension of water, and make the pH of the water more alkaline.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The oxygen atom grabs more of the shared electrons, which makes it slightly negative, leaving the hydrogen ends slightly positive. This small shift in charge is what attracts water molecules to each other.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The hydrogen atoms within each water molecule are strongly drawn toward the oxygen atoms in neighboring molecules. In fact, the hydrogen partners are so fickle that a water molecule changes partners ten billion to a hundred billion times a second.&nbsp;<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Water appears to be H 1.5 O rather than H2O&nbsp;</span>( hence the fantastic dissolving action ).</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">No one understands, why liquid water is able to carry so much heat . Water has a large heat capacity; it can take in a lot of heat without its temperature increasing very much. This makes it an especially good coolant for a car radiator, and it's the main reason temperatures are moderate for coastal communities - as the ocean is slow to cool down or warm up.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water, sanctified by chanting mantras or by bathing an idol is known as theertham.\u2019Living water\u2019 is an organized state of matter and energy, and capable of storing and transmitting information. Water in everything we eat or drink carry with it a subtle informational content that imparts a \"memory\" into our \"water body.\" The visual images that we encounter, the sounds that we hear, and our thoughts are encoded into the water of our cells to become a part of our unconscious mind.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Molecules of water are affected by our thoughts, words, and feelings. The implications go beyond homeopathy and \u2019energy medicine\" and into the interaction between water and consciousness.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxd495VdjI/AAAAAAAAAqQ/cR-D8u8RhmE/s1600/images+%252826%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxd495VdjI/AAAAAAAAAqQ/cR-D8u8RhmE/s1600/images+%252826%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water has a memory in which it stores information about the surrounding sounds, chemicals and even human emotions. Water retains information, even after the most stringent purification and filtration processes The memory is stored in clusters of H20 molecules that are formed when several molecules join together.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Our thoughts and expectations broadcast energy like a radio station that influence matter on the subatomic quantum level. If you intend that quantum particles should act or behave in a certain way, they will do as you intend. If another man thought they should behave in a completely different way, they did just that as well. In other words, the very particles that make up our physical reality changed and responded according to the specific thoughts of the observing individual\u2019s expectations.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The water molecule is not linear but bent in a special way. As a result, part of the molecule is negatively charged and part positively charged.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The hydrogen ion is positively charged. A water ioniser changes the hydrogen ion into a negative charge. Free radicals are a natural byproduct of cellular function. Free radicals expel an electron, and the extra electron damages neighboring cell nuclei and DNA, setting the stage for improper cell division and replication.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The chemistry of life is water chemistry. Without water's capacity to store and share information as different vibrating frequencies in an extraordinary manner,living cells would not be able to communicate with each other .</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">We worry about taking a external bath\u2014how about taking a proper internal bath? --for water is the universal medium for all biological activity; it dissolves, dilutes, transports, and reacts with every chemical essential for life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water can propagate fast moving 5th dimension antigravity soliton waves, maintaining its shape and velocity without dissipating its energy ( example- tsunami ).</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Hot water can be frozen faster than cold water-- Spray a fine mist of boiling water in sub zero temperatures and you get instant snow. When water is cooled to &lt; minus 135 deg C it forms a syrup called glassy water.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water blessed by healers have minor shifts in its molecular structure and decreases hydrogen bonding between the molecules, similar to what happens when water is exposed to magnets.</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Water can act as a acid as well as a base. &nbsp;water is amphiprotic or ampholytic and can act as an acid ( by losing an H+ion ) and as base ( by gaining an H+ ion ).</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"querybold\">An oxygen&nbsp;atom has six electrons in its outer (valence) shell, which can hold a total of eight. When an oxygen atom forms a single chemical bond, it shares one of its own electrons with the nucleus of another atom and receives in return a share of an electron from that atom. When bonded to two hydrogen atoms, the outer electron shell of the oxygen atom is filled.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">You can use a water drop like in the picture as a <span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">spherical lens </span>\u2013and can project all bacteria inside using a laser beam as a monstrously large shadows show on a screen behind.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Sonoluminescence -- or spectacular conversion of sound to light , happens when water is bombarded by intense light waves creating air bubbles which rapidly contract and implode with a flash of light. Then a very tiny air bubble is blown into the centre, where it implodes at temperatures of 30000 deg C. &nbsp;The light comes from the zero point field.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxdlA5J2CI/AAAAAAAAAqM/-EoZP16G-I4/s1600/images+%252825%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxdlA5J2CI/AAAAAAAAAqM/-EoZP16G-I4/s1600/images+%252825%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"margin: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Want to walk on water like Jesus Christ ( WHO NEVER EXISTED ) ?</span></span></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;Increase the shear of water by using a transparent medium. and you can have everybody amazed and praying to you . First try it in your kitchen soup. Add 2 parts of corn starch to 1 part of water. Your fingers still will detect it like water. But give an abrupt punch--it will bounce you hand back like a solid trampoline--or rather a viscoelastic membrane.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TOxfrCYqNnI/AAAAAAAAAqg/ChJE8ZZ9Q3I/s1600/images+%252829%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; id=\"c2766037549176043609\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">GANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_70B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1061350286957344881\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_70M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/17821568266464145690\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">CK</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535398556183#c1061350286957344881\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 1:05 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_70MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\nPranam Captain Ajit,<br />\nSir if water has memory, and Axolotls have such phenomenal regenerative superpowers, then the water had this imprinted within, making it \"holier\" in its power than the Ganga waters.<br />\nAlso, is it correct to assume Danavas were closer to Mayans and Aztecs than Vedics of the later period. Excuse me if my understanding is mundane. THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br /><br />THIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br /><br />THIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br /><br />THIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br /><br />IN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br /><br />I WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br /><br />I WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br /><br />MOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br /><br />ON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br /><br />I WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br /><br />I IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br /><br />IT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br /><br />MY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br /><br />WITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br /><br />BONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br /><br />PM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br /><br />AS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br /><br />WELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br /><br />YOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br /><br />HEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. BASS KAR YAAARR ...<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_188BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedsVpD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_187T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_187TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_187B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2685264252650684747\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_187M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
