font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS UNSTABLE. &nbsp;HENCE SOCIETY CAUSED MARRIAGE TO COME INTO EXISTENCE.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS A FRESH FLOWER-- MARRIAGE IS PLASTIC. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">YOU CAN MARRY THE MOST BEAUTIFUL GIRL IN THE WORLD-- AFTER 2 MONTHS SHE WONT EXCITE YOU ANY MORE PHYSICALLY. &nbsp;HENCE NEVER MARRY FOR BEAUTY.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">MARRIAGE IS THE DEATH OF LOVE. &nbsp;MARRIAGE IS A GREAT EFFORT BETWEEN TWO PERSONS TO CREATE A CONTINUING SYMPHONY. &nbsp;WHEN THE MUSIC STOPS THE STRINGS ARE STILL ATTACHED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS THE GREATEST GIFT OF GOD. &nbsp;<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">IT IS THE ONLY EXPERIENCE WHICH TRANSCENDS TIME. &nbsp; WHEN A GIRL PEEPS FROM BEHIND THE CURTAINS TO CATCH A GLIMPSE OF HER BELOVED, SHE WILL NOT KNOW HOW TIME FLIES.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE TRANSCENDS AGE , RACE , CREED AND RELIGION. &nbsp; MOST OF THE TIME WHEN YOU SAY YOU ARE IN LOVE, IT IS JUST AN ARRANGEMENT OF CONVENIENCE.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">A CANCER PATIENT ON A TWO WAY STREET OF LOVE CAN CURE HIMSELF-- SUCH IS THE POWER OF MIND OVER MATTER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">RELATIONSHIP IS A STRUCTURE, LOVE IS UNSTRUCTURED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">TRUE LOVERS HAVE GIVEN EACH OTHER A FEW MOMENTS OF ETERNITY.. THEY WILL REMEMBER THESE MOMENTS, BE GRATEFUL TO EACH OTHER AND DEPART AS FRIENDS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">LOVE CANNOT BE MANAGED , IT JUST HAPPENS. </span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS ABOUT TWO HEARTS BEATING AS ONE IN RESONANCE. &nbsp;IT MAKES THE LOVERS ACT SILLY. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE MAKES YOU LOSE SLEEP-- FOR REALITY IS NOW FAR BETTER THAN YOUR WET DREAMS.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE\u2019S WAYS ARE BEYOND YOU. IT IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR YOU TO KNOW WHEN IT IS APPROPRIATE TO START OR STOP IT. &nbsp;IF YOU WANT TO START IT AND END IT ON YOUR TIMETABLE, THEN IT WAS NOT LOVE IN THE FIRST PLACE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS AN UNCONDITIONAL GIFT, NOT A BARGAIN. &nbsp;IT BLOSSOMS ONLY IF YOU DROP YOUR EGO. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS THE ONLY NOURISHMENT FOR THE SOUL.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">LOVE IS THE ONLY BEAUTIFYING PHENOMENON IN EXISTENCE.
